1.title: Choose your series!

11.content:
Christopher Waller
Age: 20
https://i.imgur.com/mVjL3zl.jpg (thanks to Creator9 for pic!)

Backstory 1: The Grim Reapers are capable of leaping through time with their scythes. This explains why so many choose to customize theirs in the shape of modern era tools. Christopher happened to stumble upon Grell doing his job. At first the scarlet reaper was confused as to how Christopher saw him. But then began to panic as he realized this was quite the conundrum.

Christopher ended up being dumped onto Sebastian at Phantomhive Manor. What will happen when Ciel realizes he's got a man who can tell him about the future and endless knowledge that would be unobtainable elsewhere?

Backstory 2: Christopher after dealing with unbearable PTSD for so long...commits suicide. And as such is doomed to become a grim reaper as penance. All reapers were once humans who committed the sin of taking their own lives. He is taken under the wings of Ronald Knox, Grell Sutcliffe and William T. Spears.

Perhaps being a reaper won't be so bad...especially if he gets his own custom scythe like those three!
11.title: Black Butler

1111.content:
Year 2020, America

"I seriously don't get why I should have to pack up and leave my own time..." Christopher grumbled as he sat in his apartment. "Because we can't just leave you out and about now that you know about us...much less having seen what you have seen." Ronald Knox explains.

"If you'd prefer I could paint you red and get this over with..." Grell revved his chainsaw threateningly.

Chris gulped and shook his head, "I'll just...go pack."

Grell seemed to pout that he wouldn't be able to saw this human in half, but then again he wasn't on the to-die list...not today anyway. The scarlet reaper had screwed up yet again, he'd encountered a human and accidentally warped back to Reaper Dispatch with him. He informed Ronald and William of the situation and they came to an agreement that they'd plop him off on 'Bassie' and his brat.

Christopher had at least seen some combat overseas, so he might fit right in with the 'personal soldiers' of Phantomhive Manor. Though they'd definitely have to do something to make him not stick out like a sore thumb in terms of appearance.

It had been quite a normal day in the Phantomhive household. Sebastian had gotten everyone up, Ciel had his breakfast, Mey Rin knocked over the china cabinet, Finny cut up some flowers... nothing out of the ordinary happened.

It really was the epitome of a normal day. Sebastian was preparing lunch for the household when he heard loud voices from outside and a knock on the front door. He let out a light sigh of annoyance, cleaning off his flour-dusted gloves and shrugging his tailcoat back on before heading over to the front door.

He opened it calmly, frowning when he saw who was there. “Grell, is there something you need?” He asked, his eyes trailing around the small party in front of him. He paused for a moment in surprise when he saw the newcomer. He stuck out like a sore thumb. He obviously wasn’t a reaper- and his clothes... what was he wearing?!

“Who are you?” He looked at the man with a suspicious expression, obviously not trusting him. Who would? And why had Grell and Ronald decided to bring him with them to the Phantomhive manor?

Grell smiled, batting his lashes. “Bassie, we have a favor to ask of you~” The annoyance on Sebastian’s face only grew, and he rubbed his temples.

“Grell, I apologize, but I am busy. I do not have time for your antics. Perhaps later, but my master is awaiting his lunch.” And you did not want to hold Ciel’s lunch off too long.

"Ooooh lunch! We can join you! I'm sure you and the kid won't mind!" Grell was rubbing up against the pale butler at this point.

"Ahem! Mister Sutcliffe...remember why we're here..." Ronald tried to snap his superior out of their love struck stupor. "Yeah, otherwise I could just go back to my place..." Chris interjected.

"No." Ronald refused.

"Kay then why ARE we here? And didn't you at least tell them we were coming?" The future boy complained.

Meanwhile, the four servants were hiding around the corner eavesdropping.

"You see, Bassie...this lad is from the future year 2020. It is my mistake for bringing him here, and since I know you love me ever so much...I was wondering if he could stay here? Perhaps as a servant or something?" Grell declared.

"He's an expert at combat, he'll fit right in I'm sure." Ronald chirped.

Sebastian pushed Grell back, not enough to seem terribly rude, but enough to make a point. "I think that my young master would, in fact, mind if there were intruders during his lunch hour." He said, his voice still icy calm.

Bard glanced around the other servants. "What does he mean, the future year 2020?" He muttered towards the others. "I have seen them around, but are they mental patients? Jeez, explains why Sebastian dislikes that redhead so much..." He rolled his eyes.

Mey Rin stood on her toes to get a better look. "There definitely is something wrong, yes! I'm not sure what, though. But poor Sebastian!"

He raised an eyebrow. "Of course you're irresponsible with your abilities. Why should I take in a new servant?" They just took in Snake, for god's sake! He could easily sense and hear the servants, glancing back towards the corner that they were hiding behind. "I'm afraid that you will have to take him away."

But, of course, the wait woke the lion. "Sebastian, where's my lunch!" Ciel whined, coming down the stairs only to get an eyeful of two reapers and a strange man wearing... what was he wearing? Whatever it was, it looked cheap and gross. "Sebastian, why are they here?! Make them leave, at once!"

The demon sighed, beginning to try to usher the three away. "You heard him, he doesn't want you here." He said blankly.

"Well this worked out great! Any more bright ideas, red?" Chris sarcastically addressed Grell.
1111.title: Black Butler: Newcomer from the Future!

choices: Decides to take in Christopher as a servent
11111.content:
Grell pouted as his Bassie began to push them away, William surely wasn't going to be happy if they returned with the future boy in tow. There had to be some way to convince the Phantomhive brat to listen...

The scarlet reaper suddenly felt a lightbulb go off as he glanced to Ronald and gave a look to imply he had a plan. Sighing loudly, Grell turned away. "Oh what a pity, our dear future lad's knowledge of what's to come will go to waste! But i suppose if that's what you wish dear lord and Bassie!"

Ciel blinked at that, the future? "What in the bloody hell are you talking about, this man looks like you just pulled him from the gutter!", Christopher felt a cloud over his head as his casual clothes apparently were consider scraps here.

The scarlet reaper began to sway as he put a hand to his forehead. "Oh it was a simple mistake, i had taken my work to the far years of 2020. Our dear lad here saw me take the latest soul from my to-die list, unfortunately i could not take his soul so he is stuck here. I must say the philosophical words he told us were mesmerizing!"

Chris blinked at the dramatic retelling. "I told you what yolo meant-", the boy was silenced as Ronald quickly put his gloved hand over his mouth.

Grell smiled sharply as he gestured to the brunette. "So you see lord Phantomhive, we have quite the lad here that could serve you, tell you riches of the world yet to come!"

Ciel brought a hand to his chin, the reaper bringing a person from a different time was possible as he heard of their time traveling abilities. Also if it was true...a person who could give him knowledge not know, knowledge that could set him and his corporation ahead of the literal times. It was a feeling that he couldn't describe, far more gifting then the happy Christmases he onced had.

Humming the lord walked to the door besides his loyal butler, he gave a serious look to the three. "If this is all true then it could be very beneficial to me. However, i wished to hear it from this...future lad himself.", looking directly into Christopher's green eyes. "Prove to me that you come from future times."

Christopher blinked at the boy's sudden order of demonstration, looking up he saw Ronald giving a nod and Grell giving a winking thumbs up. Chris sighed before opening his large camo backpack, he needed something that didn't exist now, an item that could wow a person of high status in this time.

By now the four servents have snuck closer to watch, anticipation collided with tension as Chris began pulling an item out of his bag....

Christopher gave a serious look as he pulled out a wizard mouse toy with plastic tendrils on the top. Everyone blinked in confusion at the toy, how on earth was this supposed to convice them? Pressing a button however made everyone gasp in surprise as not only did the toy begin to make music but the tendrils began to light up and spin!

Finny looked amazed as it appeared like a colorful halo appeared over the mouse. "Wow its so colorful!", he gushed as the spinning lights moved fast. Mey Rin eyes felt as if they would pop out from her glasses. "I-is this some sort of magic!"

Bard grinned as he scratched his scruffy chin. "Hey those look like some of the fireworks back home!", Snake blinked as he watched the display, a snake head flicking its tongue as it sat up on his shoulder. "It's beautiful, says Emily."

Ciel slowly came back from the surprise coughing into his fist as he began to walk up to Christopher. "It appears these two were telling the truth, and i do have to say you have caught my attention."

The two reapers and human looked in anticipation of Ciel's next words.

He.....
11111.title: Knowledge Is Tempting

choices: Chris' Goes to Talk with Bard
Chris Goes to Chat with Finny!
111111.content:
"I suppose I can't turn down an opportunity like this. You'll be paid a wage of course, but a Phantomhive servant must be willing to do more than just scrub floors." Ciel smirked.

"Indeed, each of the Phantomhive servants doubles as private soldiers for the Earl." Sebastian chimed in. "Oh that won't be a problem! Christopher here has lots of combat experience! He's a war veteran!" Grell called out, the duo of Reapers were already halfway gone.

Bard grinned, "Another soldier, eh?"

"Hey! He hasn't even said yes, yet!" Christopher yelled at the retreating reapers.

"Yes, you're hired. But we'll have to do something about your clothes, your hair, and make sure you don't stand out too much. Sound like something you can handle, Sebastian?" The young Earl turned to his dark butler.

Sebastian sighed exasperatedly, "I have quite enough duties as it is...but if so ordered I suppose I have no choice."

Ciel pointed at Sebastian and said with authority, "This is an order: Teach Christopher how to be a Phantomhive servant!"

Sebastian bowed, "As you wish, my lord."

"Welcome to the crew!" Finny said cheerfully, gripping Chris' hand and shaking it. "Gaah!" Chris yelped as it felt like his hand was about to be crushed.

"Finny! Be careful! You'll squeeze his hand off, yes you will!" Mey-Rin squealed.

=In a Side Room=

Christopher sat in a chair, Sebastian behind him with a pair of scissors and sleeves rolled up. The butler looked the part of barber, even sporting his apron and having shed his tailcoat. "So I take it that's not what you usually look like?" Chris said, making conversation.

"Whatever do you mean?" Sebastian inquired as he continued cutting hair.

"The redhead wouldn't stop talking about you. So I already know about the you-know-what and you being a you-know-what. I'm just saying you look normal to me, no offense."

"That's because I don't actually look like this...but one must keep up appearances and so I am a butler until the contract is fulfilled. I trust you can keep a secret?" Sebastian smiled slyly as Chris felt the scissors grow dangerously close to his throat.

"Yeah, sure...you got it." Chris gulped as the demon went back to cutting his hair.

By the end of it, Chris had a lot more hair on the floor than he did on his head.

https://i.imgur.com/LpsxOS3.jpg

Looking in the hand mirror that Sebastian gave him, Chris looked himself over. "You did a good job. I like it." Chris smiled.

"Good, now to see to the matter of your clothing." Sebastian

Soon Chris would meet the overzealous Phantomhive commissioned tailor: Nina Hopkins. She quickly took his measurements in a whirlwind and despite her more creative side seeking to make something extravagant...Sebastian stepped in.

"We merely need some traditional outfits suited of a Phantomhive servant. Work clothes and personal wear shall be fine for now." Sebastian sweatdropped.

"Hmph! Fine, anything I suppose is better than the rubbish he's wearing now. Where on earth did you find this chap?!" Nina bluntly insulted Chris' wardrobe..paying no attention to the man with the cloud over his head for the moment.

Nina departed soon after, leaving Chris dazed. She didn't much enjoy designing for grown men and Chris could imagine her being a suffragette in a few years.

"So...now what?" Chris inquired of Sebastian. "I must tend to the young master's dinner. You may take this time to go meet your coworkers." Sebastian departed as well.
111111.title: A New Look for the New Servant!

choices: Tried to play his feelings off
1111111.content:
Chris sighed as the mysterious butler departed, now alone in this lavish hall. Not only was he out of place in being in a earl's mansion but he was literally out of time as well. He began walking down the pristine hallway, stroking the uniform he was given, servent's uniform or not the vest felt like it cost more then his entire life.

"How am i supposed to help out here, they said what i learned in training would help but why would a Victorian earl need me?", Chris internally struggled with all of this. One on hand he was across time and continents in a place he didn't know. Then again... what was back home?

A broken family, dealing with bad memories, or the occasional shaming from ignorant people. Would it truly be any better here?

After walking for a little, Christopher was about to pass a door when a sound caught his attention. It sounded like a sizzling yet more...intense. Slowly opening the door Chris's jaw dropped as he was greeted by a stream of fire being blasted at a stove. The brunette boy could only blink in shock as the flames dissipated, it soon showed Bard, goggles up and haired poofed.

"Alright lord Phantomhive, lunch is ready!", pulling down his goggles Bard grinned before narrowing his eyes at the charred food (and wall). "Hmm, must've overdone it again."

Shaking his hair back to it's shape, the blond man soon spotted the new servant still gaping in shock. "Ah hey there rookie, Christopher right?"

Blinking, Chris awkwardly nodded. "U-um yeah that's me! Sebastian said i should meet up with you guys. Were you...forging something in here?

Bard tilted his headat the question, slightly raising the flamethrower. "Huh no i was cooking. I figured busting out this beauty would get the lord's lunch, dinner and tomorrow's breakfast done all at once!"

Christopher froze as his eye bulged. "Cooking!? Just what kinda time did i end up in!", the brunette nervously sweated. "That's um...very innovative!", the newbie awkwardly smiled trying to make a good impression.

Bard grinned as he put aside his "cooking contraption" for now. Pulling up a sack of potatoes and some vegetables, Chris blinked as the blond chef held out a knife. "Care to help me while we talk?"

Chris nodded and took the sharp object. Laying down a carrot he began to slowly chop it up, cautious as he hadn't had much experience with cutting like this. Bard scratched his cheek as he began looking over the charred stove. Had Sebastian been here the thing be fixed up in a minute.

"So it's definitely a nice change having someone like here.", Bard said glancing over. "Having someone who's been out in battle."

Chris smiled slightly as he picked up the carrots and put them in a pot. "Are you from the states to?"

"Yeah i miss em sometimes but being here serving the earl is like a second home. Me and the others never get bored around here, especially when Sebastian helps out with any mistakes.", the chef fondly said beginning to gather other ingredients.

Chris listened, interested in the fellow American's thoughts. "What was your fighting like, did you hold a high position?"

Sighing, Bard picked up a potato and began peeling. "I was a solider, hoping one day i get to be a general. But my last day in the army was when i went to work for Ciel."

The brunette could sense some tension in those words. Hesitantly he continued. "Were you discharged?"

Shaking his head, Bard picked up another potato gazing at it with a melancholic look. "There was a issue between states, an argument about the laws and taxes our neighbors had to pay. Unfortunately my group turned out out to be outmatched and i watched the people i befriended get gunned down."

Chris grew quiet, he felt an uncomfortable twist in his gut as he heard that. The experiences he went through...he thought at a time where the military wasn't as prevalent perhaps there be more peace.

But atlas the pain and fear that cane with fighting always existed.

"Christopher, you ok?", Bard asked looking concerned at the brunette as he shook slightly.

Chris...
1111111.title: A Talk With A Chef

choices: Later, Ciel Wants to See How Chris Can Handle Himself Against Assassins
11111111.content:
Chris looked up at Bard and smiled shakily. "Y-yeah I'm okay. Just bad memories..." The rookie servant was clearly disturbed by something.

Scratching his scruffy cheek, Bard decided to try to get the younger male to open up. "So tell me a bit how war is different in the future."

Chris chuckled and continued peeling the potato. "Well, you might find out in a few years anyway. There's a major conflict coming our way in this era. It's called The War to End All Wars. But is later referred to in the history books as World War One."

Baldroy's eyes sparkled with interest, "Sounds pretty intense! Tell me!"

Chris sweatdropped, "You're being pretty intense yourself there, pal."

"W-well, basically a global conflict breaks out after alliances were formed between countries. Germany, Austria-Hungary, Bulgaria and the Ottoman Empire form the Central Powers. Against Great Britain, France, Russia, Italy, Romania, Japan and the United States Allied Powers." Christopher recited, thank goodness he remembered all that!

Bard quite literally looked like a kid at Christmas. "Woahhhh..."

"First of all I've told you countless times that the kitchen is NOT the place for your heavy artillery. And second..." Sebastian's voice suddenly cut through the air, making Bard's mood turn from wonder to nervousness.

Chris turned around and was met with Sebastian smiling sweetly at him, "That is quite the information, thank you for sharing it. I shall be sure to pass that along to the young master."

"He certainly knows how to appear innocent when he wants to." Chris thought to himself as Sebastian fixed the mess Bard had made of the stove in a jiffy.

"There. Now don't let it happen again, Bard." Sebastian said over his shoulder as he donned an apron and rolled up his sleeves. "Uh...what are ya doin'?" Bard questioned.

"What I do every day, Baldroy. Making dinner preparations." Sebastian said simply. "OI! Don't make me look low in front of the new guy!" Bard yelled out.

Christopher laughed, he could feel the walls he'd gotten so used to being built up around him...slowly begin to crumble. Perhaps life here wouldn't be so bad.
11111111.title: Opening Up to a Fellow Soldier

choices: Chris Is Taught the Basics of Being a Reaper
1112.content:
Christopher Waller would open his eyes and find himself sitting on a bench. Looking around he would realize he was sitting in some sort of waiting room.

Across from him was another bench with two people sitting on it. He didn't have long to take in much of his surroundings when he was waved over by a blond woman behind a window. Chris stood up and wandered over. "Name?" The nasally voiced woman asked without looking up from her computer.

"Uh..Christopher Waller? Hey, do you know why I'm-" Chris began to ask, only for the woman to interrupt him. "Take a number and have a seat right over there, sir."

Chris blinked but took a small piece of paper with a number printed on it: 845.

"Is this like a doctor's appointment I didn't know I had?" Chris tried once again to get an explanation out of the woman.

"Just sit right over there, we'll be right with you." The woman replied, still not looking up at him.

Sitting down on the bench once more, Chris started to talk to the other 'patients'. "Do you guys know where we are?"

"Doctor?"

"Dentist?"

"Revenue Office?"

It seemed no one else knew where any of them were. His number was called before he had more time to think on it. He stood up and proceeded through the door, almost as if on autopilot.

Before him was an almost courtroom setting. There was a row of bespectacled men glowering down at him from their seats. He stood there before these 'judges' waiting for one of them to explain what was going on.

"Christopher Waller. Age 23. Committed suicide on January 2020." The one in the middle recited in a monotone voice.

Upon hearing this, Chris began to suffer a very severe migraine. Flashes of his own apparent suicide by gun flashed in his brain...and then the pain seemed to subside as he looked up in shock.

"Uhhh...where am I?" He was starting to piece it together, this was some sort of afterlife. Hopefully he wouldn't be going to a certain fiery torture in a minute.

"You are hereby sentenced to serve as a Reaper in the Retrieval Division of the Grim Reaper Dispatch. You will reap the souls of humans and review their cinematic records until such time as your final sin has been forgiven. May God have mercy on you." The row of stern men recited his 'sentence'.

Chris blinked in confusion, "Uhh...what?"

Christopher's vision of the far away 'judges' went blurry. Holding his hand up to his eyes, he would realize that he had somehow become near sighted within the span of the last few seconds.

"The hell....?" He muttered, before he felt a pair of glasses being perched on his nose. "Uhh..." He would see he was definitely NOT in that oppressive courtroom anymore.

"Thanks will not be necessary. They are merely the same as we give all reaper trainees." A snide and stoic voice said from behind him. Turning around, he would see a man wearing a dark suit with slicked back hair. The man was wearing spectacles and had chartreuse phosphorescent eyes.

"My name is William T. Spears. I shall be overseeing your training as a reaper." William pushed up his glasses with his fingers.

A small wooden sickle was placed in Chris' hands. "Wait...is this it? I was expecting a reaper's scythe to be more...intimidating."

Before William could address that, a familiar chainsaw was revved. "Oh yes! The newbie must've expected to get something like this!!" Grelle Sutcliff waved his chainsaw around.

Christopher's eyes widened and he grew excited. "Woah! How come you got a chainsaw as yours?!"

"Custom scythes require filling out the necessary paperwork. Trainees such as yourself will have to work with what you are provided." William sighed as he dragged Chris away from Grelle.

"And I thought grim reapers were skeletons wearing hoods. Where'd that myth come from?" Chris questioned Will.
1112.title: Christopher Waller: Newbie Reaper

12.content:
Name: Renard

Species: Chimera-Human hybrid

Age 21

Appearance: https://i.imgur.com/5ATRc79.png (Not pictured is the big fluffy tail)

Bio: One of the younger human-chimera hybrids, he was kidnapped from his family and merged with a fox. Instantly the scientists realized he wasn't exactly the 'taking orders' type. He was lazy and childish and the type who would tell the superiors to 'piss off I'll do it later'. Besides, he wasn't going to kill for them...nor anyone. Busting out of his cell while awaiting 'disposal', he went into hiding until he was sure he was safe. Which happens to be after the defeat of Father. Now he runs into Alphonse during his travels to Xing with Zampano and Jerso. The adventure begins!

Abilities: Renard can control a sort of self-generated blue flame, strangely it only seems to burn who and what the foxboy wills it to. They are a bright glowing blue, and Ren can do fantastic things with it. Ren can also transform into a normal looking fluffy orange fox for more 'discreet' things...like pranks! Renard can also turn into a battle form like most other chimeras like Zampano and Jerso etc.

Renard's battle form pictured here: https://i.imgur.com/OLY4nyB.jpg
12.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

121.content:
Alphonse, Zampano and Jerso set out to Xing in about an hour or so. But currently Alphonse was distracted by something...something that seemed rather odd was trotting down the sidewalk. "Oooh how cute!" Al gushed as he approached the docile creature.

"Careful, Alphonse...that thing is acting strange..." Jerso cautioned the young blond. "Yeah...might have rabies...those things usually don't come this close to humans." Zampano said skeptically as he adjusted his glasses.

Alphonse didn't seem to be heeding his self described 'bodyguards' words, as he knelt down to the fluffy animal and cooed at it: "Aww, hello little guy...are you lost?" Al gently petted the fox's fluffy head.

The fox's tail wagged and it made pleased squeaky noises, only making Alphonse have a cute-attack even more. The fox trotted away suddenly, Alphonse following behind it and whining for it to come back.

"Ugh...guess we've got a fox to catch..." Zampano sighed.

"Let's just make sure poor kid doesn't get himself bit." Jerso groaned.

Alphonse chased the fox around a corner and looked around...the fur was so soft and since he just recently was able to feel things again...it was nice to pet what normally would be a skittish animal.

Unfortunately Alphonse frowned as the fox seemed to have disappeared. That was when he suddenly got bonked on the head by an apple which fell from the above tree.

"Ouch! What..?" Al held the fruit and looked upward to see a young boy scarcely older than Edward it seemed. Most remarkable was that the boy appeared to be a human with fox ears and a tail but was wearing regular clothes!

"Nnrghh! Almooost...." Renard grunted as he clung to the tree trunk and stretched his arm out to grab an apple.

The apple that had bonked Al on the head apparently was an accident.
121.title: An Elric's Encounter with a Fox

choices: Al and Renard chat some more
1211.content:
Renard smiled a toothy grin as he gripped the apple and snapped it from the branch. A satisfying hum rang out as he took a big bite out of the sweet fruit and layed against the tree trunk from the branch.

Looking down, Renard saw the blond boy from before looking up at him with awe. The fox boy grinned as he lifted two fingers in greeting.

"Hey, sorry did you get bonked?"

Al blinked before rubbing the back of his head. "Uh...it's fine it didn't hurt or anything."

Renard sat up and swung his legs from the tree branch. "I'm surprised, your not throwing a stick or rock at me. Congratulations you've intrigued me."

The foxboy then leaned backwards and fell from the tree. Al gasped and rushed forward to catch the strange boy, only to stare wide wide as instead of a human the fox from before landed on it's four paws.

The fox catched the half eaten apple in his mouth before finishing it and spitting out the naked core. Sprinting behind Al, the blond boy turned around only to come face to face with the foxboy smiling michiviously.

"Are you...a chimera?"

Renard frowned as he threw his arms behind his head. "Man it's been a long time since I heard that name. But to answer your question blondie, yeah I'm a human chimera hybrid."

The orange haired boy began pacing around and looking at the sky. "But I'm not really in the army's good graces, man I'm getting a headache just thinking about it."

Al fiddled with his fingers. "Um can I ask something else?", the Elric asked somewhat nervous. He got a grunt and a side eye from Renard in confirmation.

"Can i.....touch your ears?"

Renard's eyes widened as a faint blush grew on his face. The foxboy put his arms down before slowly nodded. "Ah..i...um sure!"

Smiling, Al thanked Renard and reached up to the furry appendages. The soft ears twitched as Al felt their warmth and softness while carefully caressing them. Renard's face scratched up slightly before he finally couldn't take it and let out a Purr~.

Next.....
1211.title: Al and Mr.Fox

choices: Cue the Scooby-Doo music! *Chase Ensues around the House!*
12113.content:
Soon after, Alphonse and his two chimera-human bodyguards set out to Xing. Renard went on his way, wanting to go visit this 'big brother' of the affectionate young Elric who he'd heard about.

Stowing away on a train, the fluffy passenger hopped off discreetly once it arrived in Resembool. Trotting through grassy fields, he came to a homestead that had a sign outside that said: "Rockbell Automail Repair"

"Hmmm...this must be where the older blondie lives.." Renard thought in his foxy head. Trotting up onto the porch, he spotted Den. The Rockbell family dog was looking at him curiously and gave a small 'ruff'. Ren wagged his tail and pawed at the dog with the automail front leg.

Around Renard's fluffy neck was a letter in a pouch addressed to Ed and Winry. It was from Alphonse and was meant to explain the fox's situation and how he had no where to go...so the fluffball would have to stay with them.

It was a step-up from Al bringing kittens and pleading with Ed to keep them certainly!

Renard had convinced Alphonse to leave out the part about him being a 'chimera'. The foxboy was mischievous and wanted to surprise them when he transformed!

Tapping a paw on the door in a sort of 'knock', Renard waited around the corner of the door for the answer.

A short while later a young man with blond hair tied back in a ponytail answered the door. Looking around in confusion, Edward saw no one and murmured: "Must've been nothing..."

He nearly jumped out of his skin when he felt something soft and fluffy brush past his leg and into the house.

Ed had no clue what this could be, Den was right there so...what on earth...?

"IDIOT BEANSPROUT! YOU LET A WILD ANIMAL INTO THE HOUSE!!" Pinako's shrieks emitted from behind Ed.
12113.title: Strange Fluffy Visitor

121131.content:
Ren internally giggled at the reaction he got from the elder woman and the blondie 2.0 gawking at him.

"Don't just stand there beansprout, catch it!", Pinako ordered as Ren rushed from the living room to the hall.

Ed grunted before rushing into the hall. The fox stood down the hall and tilted it's head as if amused. The blond man chuckled as he brought his hands up and started stalking towards the animal.

"Alright furball, just stay still....and there will be no- ACK!", just as Ed was about to snatch the fox, the vulpine jumped and bounced off Ed's head and hurried off in the other direction.

"GRH...COME BACK HERE!", the blondie started running after Ren throughout the halls and in and out of rooms.

Audible yells of frustration and the sound of pounding feet echoed throughout the Rockbell house as Ed chases after the fox and attempted to grab the nimble creature. Every time the fox was cornered, it cleverly found an escape route rather it be between Ed's legs or crawling through a small opening of space.

Ed panted as he ran out of the room he almost caught the fox on his fifth failed capture. The little mischief furball wasn't even running, it was simply watching him with that smug look! With renewed spirit, Ed launched himself forward with a battle cry.

Meanwhile in another room, Winry Rockbell groaned as she woke up. Last night had not been pleasant with her throwing up and feeling hot. But these thoughts were forgotten as she smiled at the cause for them, a notably round lump at her stomach.

She closed her eyes and ran a hand over the lump while humming. Despite all the side effects, Winry was grateful for the child of her and Edward living and soon to be born. These tender thoughts were interrupted as a loud THUD came outside her and Ed's room alongside familiar laughing. Slowly getting out of bed, Winry wasn't expecting the scene outside to greet her.

Ed was laying on his stomach, looking as if he had slid across the floor. Tightly grasped in his hands were a....fox?

"HA, got you now furball!", Ed smirked at Renard who now simply looked up with a lazy expression.

"Well he was more stubborn then others.
You've got some interesting family, that's for sure blondie."

Suddenly....
121131.title: Ed V. Mr.Fox

1211312.content:
Ed now noticed the little envelope tied around the fox's neck. "Huh? A letter...addressed to here?" Ed blinked in confusion.
"Ed! What's going on...?" Winry asked, equally confused. Ed sat up cross legged, holding the fox to make sure it didn't run away...although it seemed in too much of a lazy mood to bother with another chase.

To that effect, the fox yawned and sniffed at his face as the elder Elric fiddled with the envelope. Opening it up, Ed recognized his brother's handwriting. "It's from Al!" Ed said, happy to hear from his bro.

"I'll make some coffee...it's too early for this." Winry groaned as she walked past. Ed's face fell as he realized what the letter entailed.

"Dear brother, I'm getting ready to set out to Xing! I can't wait to meet my nephew! I hope you and Winry are doing well. About the fox, I found this little guy, he was all alone and had no home...he was lost in the city." Ed had a feeling he knew where this letter was going.

I know he's different than a kitten or even Xiao-Mei the panda. But please brother, take good care of him.

Ed groaned and facepalmed, "Aaaaal...."

"So how about that coffee? I couldn't eat anything on the train cause y'know...I stowed away. How about breakfast? Pancakes? Bacon? Anything?" A strange voice said to Ed.

The fox had wandered down the hall a ways and was currently sitting behind Winry as she prepared the coffee in the kitchen.

"Yeah...yeah...whatever..." Ed murmured. Until he realized he'd never heard that voice before...surely it couldn't be that dumb furball?!

"EEEEEEEED!! THE FOX IS TALKING!!!" Winry shrieked from the kitchen.
1211312.title: The Letter

12113121.content:
As Ed ran towards the kitchen, he gawked at the sight greeting him. Winry has holding a chair like a lion tamer and distancing herself from the fox. The vulpine in question sat on the floor calm with a lazy look.

"Winry what's wrong?", Ed asked his wife concerned.

Winry glanced over to Ed before focusing on the fox again. "Ed that fox....it-it asked me for coffee!"

The older Elric rose an eyebrow, he would laugh at a claim like that but Winry had nothing but seriousness in her eyes.

"Winry...look just calm down, the baby might just be stressing you ok?", Ed approached his wife and placed his hands on her shoulders. Winry felt her body relax at the touch of her lover's hands, she sighed as she lowered the chair. "Ok...i think the little guy is causing us some mischief."

Ed grinned as he rubbed her stomach. "Hey our kid isn't gonna be small he's going to be the tallest!"

"You guys are cute and everything, but she wasn't seeing things."

The couple froze as they heard the sudden voice. Looking over they widened thier eyes as the fox suddenly morphed and soon appeared as that of a young man with an eye catching pair of fox ears and tail. He scratched one of his ears as he stretched stood up. Ren gave a lazy grin and brushed his hair out of his face.

"Hey the names Renard, how about that coffee?"

CRASH!

Ed and Winry's jaw dropped as another chair flew out of nowhere and knocked the foxboy over, who simply went "huh" as he laid on the ground. Pinako let out a hymp as she dusted her hands off.

"Now that that's taken care of, Edward did you catch that critter?"

The Elric and and Rockbell gained a sweat dropped.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"So your a chimera?"

Ren gave a "Mhm" to Ed as he had a piece of toast in his mouth and munched on the food. Gulping down the bread the hybrid spoke.

"Yeah, but it got boring after getting told to do this and that not to mention they didn't appreciate my fun.", Ren chuckled as he leaned back into the couch.

"Well your welcome to stay.", Pinako suddenly said.

Ed nearly spit out his coffee. "UWA...but Granny-!"

"If Alphonse trusts him and wants us to watch him, then we outta honor his wishes."

Winry laid a hand on Ed's arm. "Al wouldn't just send a random guy here."

Ed sighed and looked at Ren. "Alright...well welcome home I guess?"

Renard's ears twitched as he smiled. "Ah~ I never knew Blondie had such good friends and family."

Ed couldn't help but chuckle at the attitude of the foxboy.

What was next?
12113121.title: That Fox Is A Guy!

choices: Ed and Winry Greet their Child and thank Renard!
121131212.content:
Winry winced as she suddenly lay a hand on her stomach. Ed turned to her as she gasped and Pinako's beady eyes widened. "E-Ed...g-granny....I think it's time!" She wheezed.

Ed started yelling and rushing around, "Alright, I'll get a pan and heat up water like we did at Rush Valley!"

"I'll call the doctor!!" Pinako rushed out of the room to use the telephone.

Winry was breathing and trying to stay calm as she could feel the baby coming. Renard caught Ed and spun him around as the young man was clearly freaking out. "Alright get in there and hold her hand, lay her down on the couch. I'll heat up the water my own way."

Ed was confused but he didn't argue, the foxboy was right...the best place for him to be was with his wife. Ren took the pan that Ed had filled up with water and pulled it into his hands.

The foxboy brought it into the living room where Ed was holding Winry's hand, he placed it on the floor with a washcloth and ignited a blue flame under it to make it start heating.

"So your chimera ability can use fire? BLUE fire?" Ed commented. "Don't worry, it only burns what I want it to..it won't even leave a scorch mark on your floor." Ren answered.

"The doctor is going to be awhile..." Pinako reported as she came back in.

"What?!" Ed blurted as Winry squeezed his hand and screamed a few choice words.

"No time...we're going to have to do this." Ren stated seriously. "Wait...YOU know how to deliver babies?!" Pinako asked.

"No, but we've not really got a choice!" Ren said as he crouched down at the other end of the couch.

Soon they had arranged a sort of makeshift area on the floor with some pillows and couch cushions. Ed was seated next to Winry and she was nearly breaking his hand with her grip. Pinako was on the opposite side of Ed and using the cloth to hold on Winry's forehead.

"AAAAaaAAAH!" Winry screamed in agony.

"Keep pushing! I see the head!" Renard said from below. "GrraaAAGGh!" Winry let out an almost feral roar and panted...then they heard the sound of a baby crying.

"Congratulations you two, it's a boy." Ren smiled as he passed the now bundled up in cloth infant to Ed and Winry.
121131212.title: Baby Time!

choices: Going home with the new arrival
1211312121.content:
The two were silent as the babe, thier baby was given to them. Winry slowly took her child and made sure he was properly supported with a hand beneath his tiny head and the other cradling him to her chest. The mother's eyes began to tear up as she took in all the baby's features.

The baby was slightly red from the agonizing ordeal and his eyes were squeezed shut as he wailed with the air in his lungs. He had short locks of golden hair matted to his head and chubby cheeks with healthy baby fat.

Ed stared wide eyed at the small baby in his wife's arms, the child soon relaxed and fell asleep against Winry's chest. He slowly raised a hand before bringing it to his....son. Gently he rested his palm on the baby's cheek and felt his warmth, it fully hit him that his son was here.

Leaning over, Ed pressed his forehead to Winry who leaned into his touch as tears rolled down her cheeks and she choked out with a smile.

"Ed...h-he's here, i... feel him, our baby."

Edward smiled as he let out a chuckle. "Hehe yeah, it's hard to believe but I'm glad." Cradling the baby's face Ed softly spoke.

"Hey there...son. I'm gonna look after you and your mom. You got nothing to worry about."

Renard and Pinako watched smiling at the tender moment between the new parents. This was interrupted as a loud knock came from the door. The elderly Rockbell groaned as she got up.

"They decide to take thier time and show up at the best part?!"

As Pinako went to answer the door, Ren looked back at Ed and Winry. The two blond parents where looking at the foxboy with a smile. Ed slowly retracted his hand and moved closer to Renard with a grateful look.

"Ren...I don't know how to express how grateful I am. Thank you." , Ed warmly smiled as he held out a hand. The foxboy gave a toothy grin as he grasped Ed's hand.

"No problem, I'm just glad everything worked out. Speaking of...", Ren suddenly rummaged through his pockets and pulled out a small blanket. The green blanket had a small sewn in picture of a small fox made out of orange thread.

"Someone gave me this a long time ago, now I think I outta give it to someone who needs it.", Ren closed his eyes and smiled as he ran a hand over the soft cloth.

Folding it up, Ren placed the blanket on the infant's chest. The babe stirred slightly before feeling around with his hand, touching the blanket he clutched it tightly and relaxed. Winry blinked away her tears and smiled at Renard.

"Thank you Ren, I can see why Al wanted to sent you."

Ren's ears stood up as a blush painted his cheeks. The foxboy awkwardly grinned and crossed his arms. "W-well I mean blondie was a pretty smart guy so I don't blame him!'
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Winry was brought to a hospital, just to ensure she and the baby were in top condition. Now lying on a hospital bed surrounded by her family and fox friend, she smiled up at Ed.

"So Ed, what should we name our son."

Ed gained a shocked look as he scratched his head. "Uh well.....how about.....Edwin?"

Winry hummed as she looked down at her sleeping son. "Edwin huh?"

The Elric grinned toothily as he leaned down. "Yeah, and we can call him Eddie. How to you feel about that son?"

Edwin slightly shifted and let out a coo before resting again. Everyone laughed at the baby's approval as Winry kissed Edwin's forehead.

"Edwin it is then."

"Well everyone's in a good mood....almost.", Ren groaned as he shifted uncomfortably. Going out in public he had to wear a big coat and hat to hide his fox features so that no bad attention was drawn. It was this or waiting outside since pets weren't allowed in.

What was next?
1211312121.title: Welcome to The World Edwin Elric

12113121211.content:
It wasn't long before Winry had been allowed to come home. It would be a difficult adjustment for the first time parents, not to mention the lack of sleep due to midnight changing or feedings. Ed sent a letter to Alphonse not long after the birth and the first night spent as a family.

Edwin was snuggled up in his fox blankie and laying against Ed's leg on the couch as the elder Elric read a book. "Hey uh....you said you didn't want me turning into a fox in front of him cause it might freak him out, remember?" Renard broke the silence as he addressed the dad.

"Yeah....why?" Ed looked up at the foxboy.

"I'm just curious how he'd respond....like if he freaks out I won't do it again." Renard shrugged. Ed frowned, he certainly didn't want the baby to be fearful of the foxboy...nor did he want to raise a wuss. "I guess the only way to find out is to try." Ed admitted.

Winry was getting some much deserved rest in the bedroom as Renard stood up from his seat and Edwin blinked up at him adorably.

Suddenly Renard turned into his adorable fluffy form and approached the baby. Edwin's little eyes widened as the foxy snout sniffed at him...and he smiled widely and giggled as he patted at the fox's head.

"Well....looks like he's cool with it." Ed smiled. "Why wouldn't he be? I'm adorable." Ren replied as he nuzzled the infant.

"Don't pop your arm out of its socket patting yourself on the back." Pinako snarked.

A knock came at the door, "Who could it be?" Ed grumbled as he gently picked up Edwin and placed him safely on the couch and got up to answer the door.

"Uh...Ed?" Ren said as he could tell what was coming as Ed went out of sight.

Edwin desperately reached his chubby little arms out towards his dad's back and started to whimper as his father left his sight.

Ed answered the door and came face to face with none other than: "Al!" Ed smiled at the sight of his younger sibling.

"WAAAaaaaAAAAH!" Erupted from the room Ed just left.
12113121211.title: Welcome Home, Edwin!

121131212111.content:
Just as Ed and Al embraced, a cry rang out and the elder Elric rushed towards the noise. Ed came in to see Ren back in his human form holding his arms up nervously as he was unsure of how to comfort Edwin.

Ren was saved as Ed hurried over and pulled the baby into his arms and began rubbing his back in circles to soothe him. Edwin's cries soon disappeared as he felt relived and clung to his father's shirt.

The foxboy rubbed his head as he stood up. "Sorry I wasn't much help this time."

Ed sighed as he tightened his hold. "It's fine, he's really attached and has trouble if we're not with him 24/7."

Ren smiled before his eyes drifted to the figure entering the room, his smile grew toothy at the familiar figure. "Hey it's been a while blondie~"

Al brightly smiled as he walked up and rubbed Ren's head and ears, getting a pur out of the foxboy. "It has Ren, it's great to see you again."

Shaking off a blush, Ren grinned as Ed spoke. "Al I want you to meet someone."

The younger Elric's eyes widened as he saw Ed approaching with a bundle in his arms. Ed smiled and glanced down at Edwin.

"Edwin meet your uncle Al."

Edwin looked at Al, the baby looked back and forth between the brothers aweing at thier similarities. Standing in front of Al, Edwin reached out and patted his cheek. Al laughed as he reached up and grasped the tiny hand and gently rubbed it.

Ed leaned down and lightly pecked Edwin's head before giving a toothy grin to Al. "Do you want to hold him?"

Al's smile widen as he nodded. Ed slowly held Edwin out for his brother with a encouraging nod. Al slowly took Edwin into his arms and held him to his chest, while rubbing the baby's back. Edwin let out a cute yawn as he laid his head in the croak of Al's neck and fell asleep while clutching his shirt.

Al felt his heart melt as he heard the baby's tiny breaths and sleep peacefully. The two brothers sat down on the couch to relax and Ren turned back into a fox and hopped back next to Al and curled up. Al cooed as he lightly bounced Edwin.

"Hey little guy I'm your uncle Al, it's nice to meet you."

What was next?
121131212111.title: Edwin Meets Uncle Al!

1211312121111.content:
Edwin soon awoke and was being bounced on Al's knee. The baby boy giggled and playfully patted at Al's face, "He likes his uncle already!" Ed grinned.

"Yeah...I'm glad. I'm really glad you and Winry are happy." Al grinned at his big brother. "Well what about you? Have you decided to tell May how you feel yet?" Ed teased.

"W-what? W-well I uhh...we were kinda busy studying Alkahestry and...." Al's face was tomato red as Ed laughed. Edwin meanwhile felt around for something on the couch, when he couldn't find it he started to whimper.

"Aww what is it little guy?" Al asked the baby. Edwin looked up at Al's face and started babbling, making motions with his hands.

"Wow...you can tell he's brainy like his dad...he's already trying to give complex explanations!" Ren joked as Ed and Al chuckled.

"What do you think he's trying to tell us?" Ed asked. Edwin held up his hands and rubbed his fingers together and held them close to himself.

"Uh....I think I know what he's wanting." Ren said as the fluffball hopped off the couch and pulled the fuzzy fox blanket from the floor. It had fallen off the couch moments earlier.

Edwin looked at the fox blanket that was placed on Al's lap before him and he started to wiggle around.

"Aboo! Fawffoo!" The baby babbled excitedly.

"I think he likes your gift..." Ed chuckled as his son snuggled the fox blanket and cooed. Winry wandered in finally, helped by Pinako.

"W-winry! Are you sure you should be out of bed?" Ed asked in a concerned tone.

"I'm not going to stay in bed all day and let you have all the fun." Winry chuckled. "Hello Al, you sure got here quick." Winry giggled as she sat down in a rocking chair.

Edwin started babbling in Winry's direction and held up the blanket and started giving a long gibberish language explanation of what just occurred.

"Talkative little fellow isn't he?" Pinako commented.
1211312121111.title: Family Bonding

12113121211111.content:
Everyone laughed and Al stood up to hand Edwin over to Winry. The mother smiled as she cradled her son who babbled and held his blanket up. Winry giggled and nodded.

"Yeah, Ren's gift is very nice."

Al's smile widened and a strange feeling graced him. So much had change from the last time he was here. His brother and friend were now married and had a child. A new member of thier family and they had a foxboy with soft ears living with them.

Winry sudden frowned as she sniffed. "Opps looks like someone's in need of a change."

Ed quickly stood up and walked over to scoop up Edwin. "Don't worry I'll get it, be back in a few!", he said shooting everyone a grin before going to the bedroom.

Pinako hummed and crossed her arms. "For the times he's been reckless, Edward sure has a parental bone in his body."

Al and Winry smiled as they remembered the past. Ed went from someone who would blow a fuse at being called short to being taller with no alchemy ability. He was still his upbeat and knowledge hungry self now with fatherly pride.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Edwin layed on the floor his fox blanket beneath him. Ren layed on his back in front of him in human form, one hand behind his head and the other in the air. Twirling his finger in a circle, the foxboy made a small fireball loop above thier heads. Edwin ohhhed as his eyes followed the blue light.

Everyone watched in delight as the baby cheered at the blue flame. Pinako was against it at first on the grounds of her house possibly burning down. But Ren assured her the fire wouldn't burn anything.

What was next?
12113121211111.title: More Bonding Together!

choices: Get the others! It's his first word!!
121131212111113.content:
It had been close to two and a half months since Edwin's birth. Alphonse was staying with them and Ed certainly didn't mind that.

Ren was lazing about as Ed had fallen asleep on the couch as he'd handled baby duty last night. Winry was cooking supper in the kitchen while Al was watching Edwin in his room.

Edwin sat on Al's lap as his uncle turned the pages of a picture book.

"C is for cow. See the cow?" Al asked the infant as he pointed at the colorful pictures.

Edwin cooed in response, it was when Al reached the F page with it's picture of a fox that things got interesting.

"It says, F is for-" Al was interrupted by Edwin squealing out: "Fwuffy!"
121131212111113.title: First Words

1211312121111131.content:
Al gasped before smiling and sped walking out of the bed room and to Ed and Ren on the couch. Ren looked up at Al looking ecstatic while holding Edwin and the book.

"Hm, blondie what's got you jumping?'. Ren asked sitting up from the floor.

The younger Elric grinned before he reached down to nudge his brother's shoulder. Ed yawned and rubbed his eyes before looking confused. "Huh, what's wrong?"

Al sat on the edge of the couch and opened the book in front of Edwin. "Ok Edwin, F is for ......."

"Fwuffy!"

Ed's jaw dropped and Ren giggled at the expression. "Good job little guy you got your pop awestruck!'

Ed suddenly burst into a huge grin as he picked up his son, snuggling up to his cheek. "Good job Eddie! oh we need to tell your mom.", Ed stood up and rushed to the kitchen with Ren and Al in tow, chuckling at Ed's excitement.

Winry was stirring up stew, with Pinako sitting nearby going over some papers. Ed came rushing holding their son and calling her name. She looked concerned at her husband. "Ed is something wrong?"

Ed shook his head and motioned Ren over. With the foxboy next to him, Ed held up Edwin with a huge smile. "Eddie what's Ren?"

The youngling babbled and reached up to rub the fox ears and got a pur in return. Edwin laughed. "Fwuffy!"

Winry nearly dropped the ladle at the word. She smiled as she pressed a kiss to her son's forehead and got a giggle.

"I can't believe it, his first word!'

Soon...
1211312121111131.title: Fwuffy!

12113121211111311.content:
The sun went down and everyone sat down to eat dinner. Baby Edwin was sitting in his high chair between his mom and dad.

"Open up, Eddie!" Ed said as he scooped a spoonful of baby food out.

The baby peeked around Ed at the apple pie that Winry had baked. Al giggled, "I think he wants some pie."

Winry smiled, "I'm sure if we mash it up enough it won't hurt. But only after you eat for Daddy."

Edwin pouted a bit but reluctantly opened his mouth for Ed to deposit the chicken themed baby food.

Shortly after that a storm rolled in as they sat in the living room. Ed and Winry sat on the couch reading a story to Edwin.

There was a flash of lightning outside and the lights went out.

"Oh bother... I'll fetch some candles. Al could you help me?" Pinako grumbled in the darkened place.

Ed and Winry felt their baby latch onto them and Eddie whimpered and began crying.
12113121211111311.title: Baby's First Storm

121131212111113111.content:
Eddie began to shake and tear up as he grabbed both of his parent's shirts. Ed seeing his son distress quickly picked him up under his armpits and pulled him into a hug. Winry hugged Ed and her son as she rubbed his back.

Edwin still whimpered and let out a fearful cry as a crash of thunder boomed. Burying his face in Ed's shirt, Edwin began crying in fear.

"Don't worry Eddie it's ok, the booms can't hurt you.", Ed said reassuringly as his son cried into him

Winry pressed a kiss to the top of Eddie's head. "Mama and papa aren't gonna let anything bad happen."

Eddie's crying turned into sniffles as he calmed down. Looking up he saw one of his father's large grins and his mother's tender one. Winry picked up his fox and gave it to Edwin who tightly clung to it.

Next....
121131212111113111.title: Comfort the Baby

1211312121111131113.content:
~Some Months Later...~

It was another fine morning in the Elric household and Ed was crouched in front of his now toddler son as the child was wobbling as he held onto the couch.

"Come on Eddie! You can do it! Walk to daddy!" Ed smiled and held his arms out to embrace his son. Winry smiled as she watched the two interact. "You can't force it Ed..." Winry sighed.

"Come oon! He's been standing there hanging on to the couch for ages now. I know he can do it." Ed replied confidently.

The youngest Elric had expanded his vocabulary to include 'ma' and 'nana' as well as 'uncky'. Ed couldn't help but feel a little left out since the baby had yet to utter a 'papa' or 'daddy'.

Renard was curled up on the couch in his fluffy fox form, making sure to keep an eye open to assure the baby wouldn't fall.

"Are you sure he's ready to walk, brother?" Alphonse asked as he sat at the table with Pinako.

"Sure I'm sure!" Ed frowned and flopped to his rear on the floor. "I don't want him to start walking as soon as I turn my back.." Ed sighed.

"Maybe it's a little early for him to walk, Edward." Pinako commented as she sipped her morning coffee.

Ed sighed in defeat, "I guess so..."

Everyone's eyes widened as they saw the little toddler quite literally begin 'toddling' towards Edward as he was looking away.

Edward obliviously stood up and turned to sit down...only to find something clinging to his leg all of a sudden!

"What the-....?" Ed looked down just as Edwin babbled: "Da..dee...wuv...da-da!" As the infant clung to his leg which he'd just walked to.
1211312121111131113.title: Another Timeskip?! *GASP*

12113121211111311131.content:
Ed let out a gasp of surprise before yelping as he fell onto his back. Everyone sweat dropped at the blond's antics.

The father groaned as his back felt sore. Edwin began toddling up Ed's body and crawled onto his chest. Eddie began petting his father's face while babbling and giggling.

"Da...Dada!", Eddie gave a toothy grin as he found Ed's awed look funny.

Ed soon grinned as he gave a big hug to Edwin and laughed as well. "Great job Eddie!"

Getting up from the floor, Ed held Eddie on his hip as he sat on the couch. The toddler giggled as he reached and stroked Ren's fluffy head and got a soft pur in return. Winry sat down next to her husband and smiled as Edwin happily bonded with the fox.
12113121211111311131.title: Happy Feels

121131212111113111311.content:
The fox purred and nuzzled up against the toddler, who giggled in response and patted Ren more.

"Well aren't you sweet?" Ren smiled a toothy grin at the baby who replied with: "Fwuffy!"

"You're pretty good with kids, Ren." Alphonse observed as he came over and stroked Renard's ear.

"W-well...I'm adorable and fluffy...kinda used to kids wanting to pet me." Renard said as his fluffy tail wagged.

Everyone laughed at this, it really seemed like the group had finally found peace after all their years of suffering and struggle.

Soon Winry was able to go back to being an automail mechanic, Alphonse and of course Ed and Renard watched after Edwin.

The toddler soon grew old enough to go to the same school as Ed and Winry and Alphonse once attended. By age 5 he was reading at far beyond the average student.

One day Edwin came home from school looking rather grumpy and holding a note from his teacher. "Edwin...what's this?" Winry asked in a dangerous tone.

"U-Uh....it's a note from Ms. Turner cause um..." Edwin fumbled over his words. Winry sighed and closed the door behind Edwin.

"What's up?" Al asked Winry as Edwin tried to dash to his room. "Edwin! You stay right here!" Winry ordered firmly.

"O-Okay..." Edwin nervously said. "Jeez...what's going on?" Ed asked curiously.

Winry sat down on the couch next to Ed and they looked over the note that said that Edwin had gotten in trouble today for fighting another boy on the playground.

Winry fixed Ed with a glare, "I blame you for this..."

"What's that supposed to mean?!" Ed blurted.

"You and Al sparring all the time in the yard! Now he's beating people up at school!" Winry yelled angrily.

"It wasn't like that mom!" Edwin butted in before this turned into a full blown argument.

"Then tell us what it was, Eddie." Al said gently.

"Well....those guys were picking on my friend. And he's always so quiet and shy...but they pick on him anyway and they always get away with it cause their dad is the principal. So at recess they pushed him down and he started crying so I went up and knocked one of them down and started to just..y'know...punch him." Edwin shyly said.
121131212111113111311.title: Continue I

1211312121111131113111.content:
The parents had mixed reactions to Edwin's story. Ed grinned while Winry sighed.

"Edwin...I know they were being mean, but you shouldn't have resorted to violence so quick.", Winry said before Ed looked at his wife surprised.

"What! Winry you heard him these brats have the principal backing them, Eddie's totally in the right here.", Ed said standing up only for Winry to do the same.

"Ed he can't just resort to violence he I know the circumstances were bad, but he shouldn't delt with the bullies differently!"

Edwin looked at his feet as his parents started bickering, he felt a tight fear in his chest as he felt it was his fault. A soft hand soon fell on his head and looking up Edwin saw his uncle giving him a soft smile.

"Eddie why don't you go to your room ok?", Al explained trying to comfort the child. Edwin nodded and hurried on to his room while Al tried to calm the two down.

Edwin laid on his bed reading one of the alchemy books his father had given to him. Usually he was enthralled in his books but he couldn't help but feel the tension of the situation from earlier. The young boy soon heard a soft padding at his door and opening it he smiled.

"Renny!"

The fox smiled as it sprinted into the boy's room. Ren transformed into his human form and sat against the bed with a sigh. Looking at Edwin while putting his hands behind his head Ren spoke.

"Your ma and pops are really going at it huh?"

Eddie nodded and sat down by the chimera hybrid. "They were being so mean, so I did what i thought was right! I don't know why their arguing.", Edwin brought his knees to his chest as he pouted.

Ren chuckled and ruffled Eddie's hair. "Hey people bicker kiddo, and this definitely ain't the first I've your parents think differently about something."

Edwin whined as he batted away Ren's hand from his now messy blonde hair. He smiled though as the foxboy pulled him into a side hug.

Meanwhile, Ed and Winry were sitting down again. Both were quiet after their shouting match. Winry sighed as she turned to her husband.

"Ed....I'm sorry I got upset. I just want Eddie to live a trouble free life."

Ed smiled as he grasped the mechanic's hand. "Yeah I get it. I suppose I should talk to him about dealing with his problems and not punching them."

The two laughed before Winry grew silent and looked down. Ed asked her if she was alright, and got a expressful look in return.

"Ed....I was late this month."

"What?"

Ed's eyes widen as Winry touched her stomach and smiled at him.
1211312121111131113111.title: Parental Disagreements

12113121211111311131111.content:
Collab Chapter ALERT!!

Blue = Creator9

Edwin looked up as his parents called him out to the living room. He gulped as he shared a look with the foxboy, "Might as well get it over with..." Ren sighed. Edwin nodded and trudged out of his room...looking like he was on death row.

However, he was surprised to see his father and especially his notoriously temperamental mother looking pretty calm and seemingly happy.

"Okay uh...why do you look so happy?" Edwin asked curiously, slightly nervous.

Alphonse came in and sat down as well, the fluffy fox form of Renard curled up on his lap. "Well..your mother just told me something...and we think you should know too..."

Al was curious as well, "What is it?"

Renard's ears perked up as he looked on in interest.

Winry picked up Edwin and set him between her and Ed. She smiled as she lightly grasped his hands and glanced to Ed's happy face.

"Eddie, you know how I've been getting more mad lately?" Winry watched Eddie slowly nod his head. "Well....the same thing happened when I was carrying you."

The room held a silence as the words processed in everyone's head. Ren's eyes shot open. "WAIT...does that..."

"Winry you're pregnant again?", Al asked surprised.

The mechanic nodded and smiled before looking at Edwin's face. The child's shocked face soon lit up as he peaked up at both of his parents.

"I-im gonna be a brother!"

Ed smiled and nodded, laughing as Eddie carefully hugged Winry before launching himself at him hugging his torso.
12113121211111311131111.title: Continue 1

121131212111113111311111.content:
CountDugula

creator9

The doorbell rang and Edwin shot up off the couch and skipped to the other room yelling: "I got it!"

"Well..he's happy..." Ren yawned and nudged Alphonse's hands for some petting as the fox was on the boy's lap.

"Yeah....I hope he won't mind not being the center of attention 24/7 after the birth." Winry sighed.

"I'm sure we'll manage...." Ed smiled and squeezed her hand.

"Daaaddyyyy! Uncle Aaaal! This nice lady says she's here to see you!" Edwin cheerfully entered the room......followed by none other than Ed and Al's teacher, looking as fierce as always.

"Teacher!", Ed and Al greeted standing up to greet Izumi who gave a quick hug to each of them. Ren hopped up next to Winry looking at the Elrics greeting their teacher. Winry looked down at the fox tilting his head and smiled.

"That's Ed and Al's teacher Izumi Curtis, you probably should go change just so that you don't surprise her.",

Ren nodded before scurrying off to Edwin's room. Ed soon came back over as Winry stood and smiled at the teacher.

"It's great to see you again Izumi, what are you doing all the way from Dublith?"

Izumi gave a small grin. "Me and Sig decided on taking a trip around to see how much things have changed.", looking down she saw Edwin looking up in awe. Izumi crouched down and smiled at the boy.

"Hello Edwin, the last time I visited you were still a baby."

Edwin blushed lightly before grinning. "Oh..well I'm grown up now!"
121131212111113111311111.title: A Surprise Visit

1211312121111131113111111.content:
Izumi smiled, "That you are....almost." She patted Edwin on the head.

Soon Winry had made them a pot of tea and they all sat chatting in the living room. "I take it you two are still working on that alternative theory to Equivalent Exchange?" Izumi asked Ed and Al.

"Yes, well....we learned a lot but we're still working out the finer details." Ed sheepishly said.

A knife impacted the wall next to Ed's head as he paled and Izumi's aura grew extremely intimidating. "What the hell are you two doing sitting around then?" She said dangerously.

"W-well...Al came home to help with Edwin-"

"What? Don't blame me for you being lazy!" Alphonse shot back, both brothers starting to bicker.

Winry sighed and murmured: "They sure haven't changed much..."

Izumi chuckled, "Not with those two."

The sound of hands clapping together followed by trademark glow of an alchemical reaction got everyone's attention. They saw Edwin kneeling there with a few colorful candles which now had 'sticks' jutting out of them.

"Yaaay! New crayons!" Edwin cheered innocently as everyone sat there with their jaws dropped.

Edwin looked up and at everyone's awed expressions, "I just did what Uncle Al does...am I not supposed to?" He asked timidly.
1211312121111131113111111.title: Startling Discovery

12113121211111311131111111.content:
Ed snapped out of his awe and grinned as he jogged over, kneeling in front of the drawn transmutation circle. The circle was drawn perfectly and to add there was the perfectly crafted crayons.

The father ruffled his son's head as he laughed. "Eddie...you did it! You did a successful transmutation.", Ed ecstatically said as the proud feeling of Edwin grew.

Edwin smiled at the reaction and soon grinned toothily. Winry soon joined them and while still surprised felt warmness as her son beamed at his successful display of alchemy.

Izumi looked at the transmutation circle, it was a exact replica of what was on a page. She placed a hand on the small Elric's shoulder.

"Edwin is this your first transmutation?"

The blond boy rubbed his head sheepishly. "Yep, dad let me look at his books and I watched uncle Al do it when he repairs something! I drawed lots of circles intill it was perfect."

Izumi gave a small smile. "Great job, keep practicing I can see your interest. Also Edward..."

Ed gulped as his teacher grew her intense air. "Teach him probably and make sure he's not reckless!"

Ed quickly nodded and eventually everyone moved make to their tea and happily conversing.
12113121211111311131111111.title: A Knack For Alchemy

choices: Looks like They Have a Family Pet!
Ed Is at First Against It..but Alphonse and Edwin Beg..
121131212111113111311111111.content:
They soon moved to sit out on the front porch and enjoy the sunny atmosphere and blue skies. "It's hard to believe it wasn't that long ago when everything was chaotic and you two were roaming the country." Winry said as she lay her head on Ed's shoulder.

Alphonse smiled as they watched Edwin run around the yard playing. "So....when are you going to get your check up?" Ren finally showed himself as he peeked out the open window.

"Check up?" Izumi raised an eyebrow, the foxboy was always somewhat of a free spirit around this place.

"I guess the jig is up." Winry chuckled.

"We're having another baby!" Ed exclaimed to Izumi.

Their teacher gasped happily and squeezed Winry's hands, "How long have you known?"

"I just told Ed awhile ago.." Winry confessed with a smile.

Shortly after this exchange, Edwin wandered toward the house with an unusually squirming lump under his shirt.

"Uhh..what's that?" Ed asked his son.

Edwin avoided eye contact and said: "What's what?"

"That lump in your shirt..." Winry said suspiciously.

"N-Nothing...I dunno what you're talking about, ma." Edwin denied.

A small meow emitted from the lump and a tiny furry head peeked out from Edwin's shirt collar.

"Uh....how did he get there?" Edwin faked surprise.
121131212111113111311111111.title: Edwin's Discovery

choices: Everyone heads back in to patch the kitten up
Ren comes out and meets his fellow furry friend
1211312121111131113111111111.content:
Ed opened his mouth the question the sudden appearance of the kitten. Before he could Al rushed forward and crouched in front of Edwin, Eyes widening his eyes at the kitten.

"Whoa Eddie where'd you find the little guy?", Al smiled as he petted the tiny grey furry head getting a cute purr in return.

Edwin smiled. "I found him on the side of the house! He was alone and huddling up to some trash fabric.", the child slowly pulled the kitten out of his shirt.

The grey kitten must have been a few weeks old due to it's size and timidity. It had some cuts and places were the grey and black fur looked thin, not the perfect health for something so young.

Edwin walked up to his parents, cradling the kitten to his chest. He slowly met their eyes while holding a nervous smile.

"Can we keep e'm mom and dad. I'll take real good care!",

Ed sighed as he remembered all the times Al had tried and take in strays, maybe Eddie inherited something from his uncle. "Eddie...I don't know of we be up for a pet. Maybe we should try and give it-"

Ed was cut off as his brother suddenly came forward. "Ed wait we can't just give up the little guy! Eddie's responsible enough and cares about him."

Winry giggled as she rubbed Ed's arm. "Edwin is always dedicated to whatever he faces, plus a nice pet for both Eddie and our next child would be great."

Izumi smiled at the display. "It seems there's a majority here."

Ed hunches over and sighed before rising and giving a grin. "Alright Eddie you can keep em, as long as you take good care of him!"

Edwin gave a toothy smile as he excitedly thanked his parents and held the kitten close as it nuzzled his cheek. Happily meowing.
1211312121111131113111111111.title: Newest Family Member

choices: Edwin FINALLY Gets the Cat Bathed!
12113121211111311131111111111.content:
"I'll go get some bandages for his cuts...but first you need to give him a bath." Winry explained as they all went inside.

Alphonse filled up a small round tin tub with soap and water. Eddie and Ed stood by and Ed had a sponge. As Edwin held the nervous kitten and approached the tub, the feline began to whimper and squirm.

"Huh? Come on it's just water-" Edwin tried to soothe the tiny cat as he crouched down and held his new pet over the warm water.

"Be careful...he might scratch you." Ed warned.

Instead, the kitten did something unexpected and clambered up onto Edwin's head and shrieked something that sounded remarkably close to:

"NOooou-ahh!!"

Ren peeked out, "Did that cat just talk?"

"Uhh....that's one distressed cat." Winry commented.

Every time Edwin tried to get the cat down into the tub, it would scramble up onto him...remarkably not using its claws, and shriek the same way.

Finally as Alphonse and Ed watched the cat was spread out over the tub, a paw on each individual corner, refusing to drop down into it. "Ed, maybe we should help him?" Alphhonse suggested.

Ed shook his head, "He wanted the cat...he's gonna have to learn how to take care of it...besides...he's not asking for help."

Edwin gently pushed down on the cat's back, getting a loud "NOOoOuUh!" in return.
12113121211111311131111111111.title: Patching up The Kitten

121131212111113111311111111111.content:
Edwin was feeling slight distress as he struggled to clean his new kitten. A thought at the back of his head tried persuading him to ask for help in bathing the stubborn kitten.

"No, I can do this! I'm not gonna give up. Come on buddy....just.....get....in the....TUB!"

The kitten was persistent in holding onto the corners and not submerging in the few inches of water. All while bellowing its cat version of no.

Edwin internally rubbed his hands together as he hatched a plan. The child sighed as he lifted the kitten up, it seemed he had finally given as the kitten stopped its shrieks....

The child chuckled as his face shifted from one of defeat to a victorious one as he quickly took advantage of the cat's calm and placed it in the water before its paws could latch onto the side.

Ed and Al chuckled at the plan as Edwin was giddy from his victory. Al smiled warmly as he saw his brother reflected in Edwin, he was determined and relishing in his victory.

The cat meowed grumpily as Edwin scooped up water and poured it on his fur to clean it. Using some soap, the child carefully scrubbed of any dirt and watched the cuts littered across.

Now fully clean, Edwin picked up the kitten and wrapped it in a towel while gently drying the grey fur. Winry knelt down next to her son as she unraveled some guaze.

The mother smiled as she showed how to wrap up the injuries. "Good job Eddie, your being really determined."

Edwin smiled and rubbed the kitten's head, now purring after the wet ordeal.
121131212111113111311111111111.title: A Successful Wash

122.content:
It was shortly after the Elrics had met Ling and were staying in their hotel room as Edward had just gotten his automail repaired after the skirmish with Lan Fan and Fu.

An alchemical reaction sparked in the ceiling and out of thin air a young teenage boy with golden hair fell down and landed on Alphonse's armored body. "Waaagh!" Al yelped along with the mysterious boy.

"What the hell?!" Ed yelled as he shot to his feet and prepared for a fight.

The young boy hissed in pain and lay on the floor as Alphonse picked his head back up. "Ed...what's going on?!" Winry burst into the room to find Edward having got a stranger by the collar. "This guy just dropped from the ceiling! That was alchemy just now!" Ed sneered at the strange invader.

"But what kind of alchemy can make people appear out of thin air?" Alphonse asked slightly confused.

"Wait....dad!" The boy exclaimed and suddenly hugged Ed.

"Uhhhh...?" Winry murmured in a confused tone.
122.title: Edwin the Time Alchemist

choices: Ed inquires about this new alchemy
Edwin spills info about the future
1221.content:
Ed blinked before trying to pull the child of him. "Ack kid what are you doing?!"

The stranger looked up in confusion at Ed before jumping back and widening his eyes. His face suddenly gained a sad look.

"Dad...dosen't recognize me? How far back did I go?"

Ed crossed his arms and walked up to the blond kid. "Look brat I've never seen that type of alchemy before, what I want to know more is why is made you pop up here."

Winry walked over finally snapped out of the surprise with a frown. "Ed your acting really hostile to him."

Al kneeled down next to the boy. "I'm sure he didn't show up to hurt us brother. I think were making him very uncomfortable."

Ed looked between his friend and brother before looking at the child. The young one looked up with a smile.

"I'm sorry for suddenly popping in, it was...a new alchemy my dad came up with!"

The elder Elric rubbed his head and sighed. He suddenly gained an interest as he thought about what the stranger said. A new type of alchemy created?
1221.title: Well this is Awkward...

12211.content:
"So uh....what kind of new alchemy is it?" Ed asked curiously. Edwin nodded and pulled out a notepad and handed it to Ed. What Edward would notice immediately was that it was his handwriting AND his chosen method of 'coding' his notes.

"Alright...what's going on? This is my handwriting but I don't remember writing it! Did you swipe something?" Ed asked suspiciously.

Edwin crossed his arms, "I told you, dad! My DAD came up with it!" He hmphed with a pout. "Stop calling me dad!" Ed snapped.

"Nope. I'll make it better!" Edwin pointed at Alphonse, "Uncle Al. Aaaaand....Mom!" When Edwin pointed at Winry...he said 'mom'.

"W-w-whAAaaAAAT!?" Winry yelled out, causing everyone to clasp their hands over their ears.

Ed and Winry avoided eye contact and flushed red in the face. Alphonse looked over the notes, "Time Alchemy? How does it work?"

"Well, you just make the transmutation circle with the inscription of how far back you wanna go..but I think I might've made a mistake and came back too far." Edwin admitted.

"By the way...what's your name?" Al asked.

"Edwin! But most people call me Eddie!" Edwin happily replied.
12211.title: Time Alchemy

122111.content:
Bold = Creator9's work

~~~~
Ed rubbed his head as he tried to cool his face down. Him and Winry....a boy looking only a little younger then him. And he exists from him and Winry....

Ok so his attempt to stop the blush failed, Winry wasn't doing so well either as she held her cheeks. Meanwhile Al knelt down next to Edwin.

"Edwin, if everything you said is true then....do me and brother reclaim our bodies?", despite his face being one of metal, Edwin could hear the weight and emotion in his uncle's voice.

The young boy grinned as he wrapped his arms as much as he could around the large metal body. Ed and Winry snapped out of their fluster at the question and came closer anticipating the answer that could reveal the future.

"Uh huh! You both do!" Edwin declared happily. If Alphonse could've cried he would've been crying tears of joy right now, he hugged Edwin close and cheered happily..despite the young boy squirming and complaining that he couldn't breathe.

"Really?! Oh boy I can't wait!" Alphonse cheered as Edwin grunted from being smooshed.

"That's so good to hear..." Winry said wiping away some tears.

Ed was shocked and felt confused on how to feel. He felt seeds of joy blossoming at this happy future foretold by his...son. Edwin had finally gotten out of the embrace and let out a huff of breath. The elder Elric brother knelt down and placed his hands on his son shoulders. It was going to take time to get use to addressing him as that.

Edwin smiled a toothy grin that the three could see Ed in. The son placed his hands on his father's, his smile turned a bit somber as he felt the cold metal of his father's automail.

Ed cleared his throat before slowly pulling Edwin close and embracing him. "Well then... hi Eddie."
122111.title: Yet ANOTHER Collab Chapter

choices: The next day, it's time to head out
Theres a sudden disturbance in time
1221111.content:
Bold = CountDugula

Edwin smiled as he embraced his dad, feeling tears in the corner of his eyes. It had been a while since he'd been in the presence of his parents.

The Elric son looked over to Winry, feeling the streaks now pouring down. "Mama?"

Winry placed her hands on her chest as Edwin called her that. A warmth filled her chest as she smiled through her choked tears.
