She wrapped her arms around Ed and Edwin, soon feeling The Fullmetal Alchemist rest his organic hand on her back. Had this been what her parents felt when they were alive?

Edwin clenched his teeth as he started hiccuping with the tears dropping to the floor. Ed and Winry pulled away and looked at their son breaking down.

"Eddie, what's wrong?", Ed asked concerned.

The young Elric furiously whipped his eyes. He gave a shaky grin. "S-sorry....it's just been a while since we all were this close.

Winry frowned concerned. "What do you mean Eddie, why wouldn't we be close?"

Edwin started standing up on shaking legs, getting help up from Al as he caught him from falling. The young Elric had a sorrowful look that turned to anger as he spoke.

"It's because of the basterd created by the damn military. He ruined everything! Dad went missing and mom and Nina needed to stay home while I was brought to central!", Edwin clenched his fists as he started replying the events up intill now.

The other three occupants in the room felt a wave of emotions, but the most grounded one was fear.

"Eddie what are you talking about...the military created what?", Al asked confused at the future boy's words.

Edwin looked up with hardened eyes. "Everthing was peaceful, relations with Xing strengthened and the Ishvalan people were given more autonomy. But the military wanted to make sure that the peace lasted....so they made something to maintain the peace and called him......Frieden."

The name came out of Edwin's mouth with bitterness and in a spat. It was shown whoever this Frieden was, he had been a source of bad omens.

"He's a bio-organic automaton, like a robot but an imitation human." Edwin explained.

"Like the homunculi?" Ed asked curiously. "Kinda. It started out alright...but then it started thinking for itself and decided to take extreme measures all in the name of our 'safety'. All weapons were confiscated and destroyed, anyone who resisted was killed, it destroyed the entire military within a week..so many people died. Then it started killing anyone who practiced alchemy, it forced a curfew and rationing of food and supplies. Then one day it claimed it ran some calculations and..." Edwin looked down at the floor.

"Frieden declared that humanity was an irreparably flawed species and that we would eventually destroy ourselves. He decided the only way to start anew and 'correct' our flaws."

Edwin held his head in his hands, "I was supposed to go back in time and keep Frieden from being created. But I went too far back....now I'm stuck here."

Seeing his son's distress, Ed quickly wrapped a arm around Edwin and started rubbing a circle in his back. Edwin took a deep breath as he calmed down at his father's comfort. He focused his attention back on his parents and uncle.

"I need to go forward, move ahead in time before it's too late!"

"Edwin calm down, can't you use the time alchemy?", Winry asked.

The young boy looked to the window in the room and was silent for a few seconds before closing his eyes.

"I can....but I don't have the notes and I didn't just come back to stop Frieden from being created. I came back to escape him."

Everyone was taken aback by the statement. Ed gribbed Edwin's shoulders as he looked into the same golden eyes.

"Edwin just what happened when you crossed time?"

The young boy took a breath and exhaled. "Me and uncle Al had been secretly planning to complete the transmutation. Al managed to copy some of your notes, all of them were your theories and research. We had almost all the notes but the remaining pieces had been taken and held at central. I managed to get it but Frieden had already memorized the transmutation and already crafted one. So....he went back and I followed him."

The grounded fear began to rise up in everyone's chest. This creation of peace that was bend on birthing a new world was not only a reality......but a reality that would transcend time and strike fear into those that don't even know of Frieden's existence.

A shadow fell over Edwin's eyes as he looked down. "I don't know where he is...and he could destroy everything because I didn't get the transmutation right. I'm sorr-"

The time traveler was cut off as Ed placed a hand on his head and ruffled his hair. Looking up, Edwin saw his father was smiling at him.

"Don't worry Eddie, like hell I'd let some monster hurt my family!"

Everyone felt the fear disperse at the alchemist's words. Family....it was a strong word that casted light on the situation. Winry smiled and nodded.

"There has to be a way to stop Frieden, and I know like Ed you won't give up."

The gloves of Al's armor placed themselves on Edwin's shoulders. "So we'll help you and the future!"

Edwin brightly smiled at the words of his family. This was what his future was meant to be, not fear and despair. But bright and full of hope!

"Alright!"

Everyone smiled, suddenly Ed had a confused look as he removed his hand. "Edwin you said that Winry stayed home with....Nina?"

Edwin nodded and rubbed his head. "Oh yeah Nina is my sister!....and your daughter."

Surprise struck everyone again. The Elrics felt a ting of sadness as the memory of their innocent friend was brought up. There was however a warmth as the thought of honoring her in Ed's daughter.

"Uhhh...so we should first deal with the most present threat." Edwin stated as he went over to the table. "You guys probably haven't gotten far along enough to figure it out yet but...we need to get this over with so we can tackle Frieden."

"What do you mean?" Winry asked. "Dad, you went to Xerxes ruins and found you-know-who was alive right?" Edwin looked around warily.

"Yeah, you mean Ross...." Edward said softly.

"And you've um...dug up what you and uncle Al created that night....found out it wasn't grandma?" Edwin nervously shifted in his seat.

Edward was quiet for a while and then nodded, he really was from the future.

"And mom...almost shot Scar cause...." Edwin sheepishly said.

"Yeah..." Winry clutched her shoulders.

"Okay...do you have a map somewhere of Amestris?" Edwin asked.

"I'll go get one from the front desk!" Alphonse raced downstairs.

"Dad....you need to get in contact with grandpa." Edwin said.

"What?! Why would I wanna do that?! And don't call him-" Edward snapped, still the cocky teenager he was.

"It's a long story, one better told by Hohenheim....seeing as it involves him." Edwin stated seriously as Al brought in the map.

"Okay, you remember how Envy told you guys you were important sacrifices? Right now the Homunculus known as Sloth is digging a tunnel going all around the country." Edwin lay out the map and began to 'connect the dots' to make the Nationwide Transmutation Circle.

Everyone was stunned, "The Homunculi are planning on using the entire nation as a giant transmutation circle to create a giant Philosopher's Stone for their boss."

"W-what?!" Winry gasped in horror.

"Guys, I'm not finished. Selim Bradley and Fuhrer Bradley are Homunculi. They're in on it.."

The three looked to Edwin with clear shock. All of this seemed unreal the humoncili plans, the giant transmutation circle, and the leader of the country along with his son were in on it.

"B-brother maybe we should contact colonel Mustang.", Al nervously spoke.

Ed clenched his fist and shook his head. "We can't do that Al, if this information gets leaked who knows what will happen?"

"The phones one thing but what if you met privately.", Winry suggested trying to keep calm in the current situation.

"Dad when could we catch a train to Central?", Edwin asked leaning towards his dad.

Ed looked in thought. "We can try tommarow, hopefully everything is the same as last time."

It was set in motion, a plan to not only save the future but also the present. Hopefully they could successfully thrawd this ginormous plan threatening to sacrifice the people of Amestris. Still the thought of this "bringer of peace" lurking somewhere out in the span of time was a negative thought eating at everyone's mind.
1221111.title: Tales Of The Future

12211111.content:
The next day, Mustang called Fullmetal and told him to meet him in the woods outside of Central that night. Ling and Lanfan had captured Gluttony and he was now at a secure location in an abandoned house.

Winry said her goodbyes and caught a train back to Resembool, while Ed, Al and Edwin went to the 'secure location'.

It was nighttime by the time they reached the house, Lanfan was recovering from surgery. "Wait, so you expect me to believe that this kid is yours and he's come back in time?" Mustang deadpanned at Fullmetal's explanation.

"It's true! He knows things that he couldn't possibly know otherwise." Al said.

"You need to hear this..." Ed stated seriously. Riza, Mustang, and Ling were told about the Nationwide Transmutation Circle, and Ling having encountered and sensed Bradley...he confirmed that the King's aura was similar to Gluttony's

Mustang was at a lost for words, not only was there a plan to sacrifice the citizens but their leader was in on it from the beginning. He looked to Riza who was in disbelief at the news as well.

Edwin cleared his throat. "Colonel I know this is all a lot. But Dad and everyone from my time experienced it...and he told me everything that happened so I can help in any way!"

The colonel took a breath before holding his hand out to the Elric son. He gave a friendly smile. "Thank you Edwin, the situation at hand may be difficult but you being here must be evidence that there is a way to ."

Edwin smiled and shook his hand. Riza felt a small smile tug at her lips, the future boy and her superior weren't squabbling like he and Edward did.

Ling hummed and rubbed his chin. "Say Edwin...would you happen to know what the future of Xing is like?", the prince seemed eager as he stepped up to the teen.

Edwin had a thoughtful look. "Well....you become the next emperor! And the last I've heard you only have one heir."

The prince made a O with his mouth as he smiled and thought about the future. He succeeds in becoming Xing's ruler and has a child through the less chaotic means as his father and half-siblings.

"M-Mustaaaang...." Gluttony shrieked as the red energy began to crackle around his restrained form.

"MUSTANG KILLED LUST!" Gluttony suddenly broke his restraints...his belly opened and a single grey eye was seen...causing Ed to be reminded of The Gate.

Gluttony began sucking in everything in sight, including half of the house! "What the hell!?" Mustang shouted as Ling grabbed Lan Fan as the entire building began to collapse.

"SWALLOW...SWALLOW EVERYTHING!" Gluttony roared.
12211111.title: The next day, it's time to head out

122111111.content:
Edwin sat up as he watched Gluttony emerge from the blasted open wall. He was feeling a mix of fear and disgust as he watched the homunculus opened up and hungering for anything around him.

Riza had one of her guns locked onto Gluttony only for Mustang to have her hold fire.

"We've got no choice but to bring him down.", the colonel said as he put on a new alchemy glove.

Al had argued against this, after the trouble it took to capture the homunculus. However Mustang said that survival was their priority and that Gluttony knew of them and couldn't escape alive. Edwin couldn't help but agree with that.

With a snap, the colonel sent a fiery blaze onto the homunculus. The future boy couldn't help but get a sense of awe at the display.

Ed stood up helping his son stand as well. "Are you ok Eddie?", he asked concerned.

"Y-yeah dad."

Before he could sigh in relief, Ed looked with everyone to see the flames swirling and beginning to shrink. It soon revealed that in fact Gluttony was eating the flames itself! The homunculus let out a sigh as he finished the HOT meal.

"He swallowed the flame?", Ed squinted his eyes.

They soon sprang into action as Gluttony launched an attack at them. The four began sprinting off into the woods as Ed shouted about the colonel useless attack. The quartet soon split into the trees, Edwin running with his dad while hearing the distance sound of shots going off.

Edward had a plan in mind, hopefully he could buy some more time with this. He held out his arm to stop his son, getting a confused grunt. Edwin was about to question his dad before he heard a clap and a sparkling glow. The future boy's jaw dropped at the wooden dummy, he couldn't question it as Ed grabbed his hand and started running again.

They soon all regrouped as Mr.Knox urged them to get in the automobile. Mustang began to argue as he was shoved in the car only for the Elric brothers and Riza refuted his words. Edwin felt bad as he saw the downed mood of the colonel.

"Um thank you for your time colonel!"

Mustang gained some . "Ah Edwin, you didn't inherit all of your father's traits."

"THE HELL DOES THAT MEAN!"

Dr.Knox looked back urgently. "Enough of that, come on get in!"

However to the surprise to the car's occupants, the three young men turned to each other and nodded. Ed looked to his son who seem to pick up on the thought and smile at his dad.

"The car is full, right? Go on.", Ed smiled

This surprise them and they tried to convince them but they argued back. Being children didn't affect them, they would fight the homunculus. It was silent until Riza handed Ed one of her pistols saying that it was to protect themselves. Ed had a conflicted look as he thought of Winry and how she had aimed at Scar, he thought of Edwin and imagined him with his daughter. He finally took the pistol, promising to hold onto it.

Edwin looked at his father concerned before he started to place a hand on his shoulder. He wasn't able to as a loud boom and red bolt came from the forest. Edwin took a breath before running with his dad into the woods, hearing the cries of Lan Fan and the vechile leaving.

The four stayed hidden as Gluttony rampaged, destroying trees while demanding for the killer of Lust. Edwin couldn't help but shuddered at the yells of the homunculus, he felt a palm on his head and looked up to Ed still watching Gluttony while subconsciously sensing his son's fear.

Edwin smiled but suddenly turned with everyone as they heard a sound from a hill above. The future boy widened his eyes as he saw.....a dog. While this wouldn't be a shocking sight, Edwin was unnerved as he saw the glowing red orbs. That wasn't the last of surprises.

"Stop Gluttony!", The dog actually spoke human words and made the homunculus cease his rampage.

Everyone stared in disbelief however Edwin widened his eyes as he watched red sparks surround the dog and the fur disappeared with red lines to reveal a humanoid body.

"Long time no see, Fullmetal Pipsqueak~", the stranger smirked.

"Wait...animal that speaks, long wispy hair, and a large smirk. That's it! The homunculus dad said was named Envy!"

"Dad that's...eh?", Edwin was about to talk to Ed but saw a flashing outline of where he was. "Where did you..."

"WHO ARE YOU CALLING A SHRIMPY, FLEA SIZED PARAMECIUM?!", Ed yelled as he attempted to deliver a raging kick to the unsuspecting Envy.

Edwin sweatdropped at the action. "Umm is dad ok?"

Al leaned over and whispered. "Brother doesn't take well in being reminded of his size. By any chance does Ed grow taller in the future?"

Edwin blinked as he watched Envy dodge Ed's blows and break a tree with a punch. "Um yeah he was taller then 6 feet in his last doctor's visit."

Al made a sound as he thought. "Perhaps you should inform him of this later. It may calm him down more in these situations."
122111111.title: Ramage Of The Homonculi

1221111111.content:
"Hold on! I just came here to get Gluttony! I'm not here to fight!" Envy called to Ed, clearly not intent on fighting a 'sacrifice'.

Turning towards Gluttony, Envy tched. "You're becoming bothersome!"

"Mustang was here! SWALLOW HIM UP!" Gluttony roared. ."You don't get the colonel! Or the Elrics! They're important sacrifices! Eat the Xing brat instead!" Envy pointed at Ling, who began to comically run away while being chased by Gluttony.

Ed turned to Al and gained a devilish grin, "You thinking what I'm thinking?"

"I guess they really aren't allowed to hurt us..." Alphonse admitted.

Edward clapped his hands and brought up a barrier which set Envy, Ling and Edwin on one side and Al, Edward and Gluttony on the other. Envy scowled and finally noticed Edwin. "Who the heck are you? You look like an even shorter version of Edward."

"WHO YOU CALLING SHORT?!!" The elder Elric in question came bursting through the wall at Envy.

"Jeez...." Edwin murmured as Ling went on the offensive against Envy...Edward and Alphonse dealt with Gluttony.

Ling seemed to have the upper hand, slicing off Envy's arms and a leg. "Way to go!" Edwin cheered, then he spotted a familiar figure near the trees.

The man had slicked back blond hair, was wearing sunglasses and wore a long black coat. Edwin grit his teeth, it was HIM!

"Who the hell are you!?!" Envy demanded of the mysterious figure. "Can I eat him?!" Gluttony inquired.

"That man...he's got a similar vibe as a Homunculus...but he's different....he doesn't even resemble a human." Ling said in horror.

"You walking talking monkeys with your primitive outlooks on things. You desperately fight to stay alive, yet you don't want things to change." The mystery figure said as he began to advance forward.

"What are you talking about? Who the hell are-" Envy demanded, only for the man to grip the top of the Homunculus' head and literally tear the top of his skull off.

"Hush little abomination...you'll find that you're just meat and bone...like all the rest."

"Who are you?!! Another homunculus?!" Alphonse demanded.

In an instant, the man appeared to teleport in front of Alphonse, gripping the suit of armor by the wrist. "Do not compare me to them! I am superior! They are NOTHING!" Friedon tore Alphonse's arm off effortlessly.

"AL!" Edward cried out and rushed to help his brother.

"You're all puppets..." Frieden spat and threw Al to the ground.

"Then what does that make you?!?" Ling rushed to attack with his sword.

Frieden smirked, "I am a puppet who can see the strings."

Before this could go any further, Gluttony began inhaling things directly in the path of Frieden, Edwin, the regenerating Envy, Ling and Edward. In an instant they were all sucked into the belly of the Homunculus.
1221111111.title: Arrival from the Future

12211111111.content:
Edwin groaned as he felt his consciousness beginning to awaken, his body was being lightly shaken and he heard a muffled voice above.

"E...ie...Eddie!"

Opening his eyes, the future boy blinked slowly as a humid air hit them. The figure above him cleared and revealed his father with a relieved look.

"Eddie your awake!", Ed slowly pulled his son intill he was sitting up.

"Uhh...dad where are w-!", Edwin snapped out of his grogginess as he gasped at the environment around him. It was if they were in a whole other world, one more terrifying and dark then the previous.

The floor was covered in dark liquid, its smell confirmed it as blood. There was a assortment of different architects, debris, and the most unnerving of all was the decayed corpse of a man. There were beacons of fire on top of the pillers

"W-where are we?", Edwin's voice shook as he asked.

Ed tched and shook his head. "I don't know, Al and Ling are no where in sight. And on top of that Envy and that basterd could be here as well!"

Despite his frustration Ed noticed how Edwin put his head down as he mentioned the newest enemy. "Eddie you seemed to recognize that guy."

Edwin clenched his teeth as he stood up. "Dad hes from the future and saw himself above you and the homunculus. Theres one guy I know who fits that description.", the young boy spoke in a quiet voice laced with bitterness.

Ed widened his eyes. "Then that guy was....Frieden."

Rather then confirming this, Edwin ran a few yards forward and looked up into the dark sky with anger.

"So you came here huh? WELL THEN STOP STALLING AND SHOW YOURSELF BASTERD!"

Edwin began sprinting away while yelling, Ed widened his eyes and chased after his son. "Eddie wait!"

The young boy didn't stop. "YOU WEREN'T SATISFED TAKING AWAY THE ONES I LOVED THEN SO YOUR DOING IT NOW HUH?!"

"Eddie stop!"

"I'LL TEAR YOU INTO SCRAP AND SENT YOU STRAIGHT TO HELL YOU HE-!"

"EDWIN ELRIC!"

That got Edwin to stop. The boy's shoulders were stiff as he brought up a hand to brush the hair out of his face. A dry chuckle came out, with a lack of humor.

"Its been awhile since you used my full name. Heh, the last time was when I played past dark."

Edwin dropped his hand to his side, Ed was unaware of his son's expression as his back faced him. Ed slowly walked up, placing a hand on Edwin's shoulder which made the stiffness cease. The son's face was melancholic as he met his father's eyes.

Ed frowned and diverted his eyes before wrapping an arm around Edwin's shoulder and bringing him over to a large bolder. The two sat down with Edwin pulling his legs to his chest.

"Despite everything that happened I enjoyed spending time with you.", Edwin quietly spoke.

Ed nodded. "I never expected this, sitting with my son from the future and getting dumped in some weird wasteland. Edwin you said I went missing in the future, did i....."

"If your asking if your dead...I honestly can't tell. When the purge of alchemists started we were afraid that you would be targeted since you were associated with it. When I was 11, you had to go into hiding alone."

Ed looked shocked, he had to vanish from the public and leave his family?. "Why would I go alone, shouldn't I have taken everyone?"

Edwin pulled his legs closer. "You had to....you were best known for all your alchemy achievements. Me, Nina, and mom hadn't made any headlines so we were unsuspected. Not to mention you told me if we all went into hiding and were caught.....none of us would be spared."

The young boy's body started trembling as a shadow covered his eyes. "We couldn't send letters or packages. Mom always said that you would be find and show up any day. But I felt terrified.....not knowing if your were still hiding or killed."

Ed felt his face and heart drop as Edwin put his face into his knees.

"Nina came into my room in the middle of the night. She had a nightmare and didn't want to wake mom cause she was getting little sleep with work. I helped her back and tucked her in, then she asked me....."

"When is daddy coming back home?"

Edwin looked up at Ed with a shaky frown as tears fell from his eyes. "I couldn't even answer her question, what do you say to that? I hoped that this was just some sick dream and when I woke up every day you'd be opening my door and smiling at me."

Ed had a shadow over his eyes as he suddenly pulled Edwin close into a embrace. The son began sobbing as he gripped onto his father, longing for the familar hug he always been given.

"P-please...don't leave....me."

Ed opened his eyes with a determinated look as he hugged his son tighter. "I promise Eddie, I won't leave ever."

The father and son soon separated and Edwin wiped the tears from his face. Ed smiled as he patted his son on the back and got a grin in return.

A small grumbling came from Edwin's stomach causing him to flush in embarrassment. "Hehe, I guess I should have had more for breakfast."

Ed rubbed his chin for a moment before bending down. Edwin looked in confusion as his father slipped off one of his boots and held it up.

"You can eat leather Eddie.", Ed grinned.

Edwin let out a GAH in surprise as his hair flashed up. "W-what?"

Ed brought the boot closer making Edwin scoot away. The father groaned as he started scooting around the boulder in circles after Edwin.

"Eddie come on I don't want you hungry!", Ed pushed the shoe only for it to be push back by Edwin who had a cocky grin.

"Hehe I rather eat rock then your boot!"

The father and son soon shared a laugh. Frieden may be in this labyrinth, but it wouldn't sever the cord that connects family.
12211111111.title: A Son's Anguish

122111111111.content:
Soon though, Edwin's hunger got the best of him and he stopped his refusal. "So uhh...do we cook em' or what?" Edwin asked skeptically.

Edward clapped his hands and transmuted a sort of pot from the boulder they were on. "So we're gonna boil it? But what will we use for-" Eddie made a disgusted face as Edward scooped up some blood from the 'sea' and poured it into the pot.

"This is so gross...." Eddie groaned as Edward thankfully transmuted the blood to clear water.

"Shuddup, I could've made you eat the one on my human foot!" Edward snarked as Eddie shuddered.

As the cut up boot boiled, Eddie looked over at Ed. "I'm actually surprised you believed me back when I told you I was your son."

"Hm? Why's that?" Edward asked curiously. "Well...some guy just shows up claiming he's from the future and all...I might not have believed me myself."

"Well you knew things you couldn't have known otherwise, and you had those notes and stuff." Ed shrugged. Edwin nodded in understanding.

"It's gonna feel weird not calling you 'dad' in front of the Homunculi....just for safety." Edwin admitted.

"They'll probably figure it out sooner or later..." Ed commented and stood up.. "Besides, we're gonna beat em anyway....otherwise you wouldn't be here." He grinned.

"Well...is the food ready?" Eddie jokingly asked, but also seriously. "Yeah, this should do it." Ed scooped the boot chunks into bowls and Eddie frowned down at his.

"I can't believe this..." Edwin sighed as he looked over at Ed and saw his father was tearing into his half like it was a juicy steak.

Once their meager makeshift dinner was finished, the bowls sat empty and Ed and Eddie sat cross legged facing each other. "So tell me about this time alchemy stuff." Ed eagerly asked, ever the scientist.

"Well first of all ya gotta understand the theory behind it." Eddie grinned. Ed was clearly excited to learn about it, like an eager child.

Eddie dipped his finger in the blood and drew a line on the boulder's surface. "Okay, let's say this line represents what timeline we're in right now. The theory of strings says that for every choice or action you take...." Eddie drew another line, "There's another universe where the opposite choice is made."
122111111111.title: Boot and Bonding

1221111111111.content:
"So then there would be a different future from yours and even this one?", Ed curiously asked he watched his son draw the lines.

Edwin nodded. "So for everything we've done there may have been a vastly different outcome. Like a branch growing from a try there all different paths that happened in different universes."

Ed grinned. "Man this unbelievable, all this new research.!"

Eddie smiled as he drew a small circle. "You and uncle Al came up with the research and started drawing up sketches of the transmutation circles. It was kinda like a leap of faith using it for the first time, but I really needed to stop the creation of the basterd.

Edwin had drawn the circle, but stopped as he furrowed his eyebrows. "I wish I remembered the exact drawing. I'm stuck here intill then"

Ed leaned back and hummed. "What was your plan, I mean you needed to go back but how would you return to the future?"

Eddie looked of to the side. "I was hoping I would end up before the creation of Frieden and either destroy him in the early stages or persuade the military to stop his development all together. After that I thought of asking you for the time alchemy notes, but I doubt you started them this far back.", Edwin felt a rain cloud grow over him as he fell onto his side contemplating the situation.

Ed sweatdropped before pulling his son back up. "So what am I like in the future Eddie, at least before all the bad stuff happened?"

Edwin put on a thinking face before he internally smirked. "Oh you were a priest!"

Ed's face fell. "Wha.."

"Yep you renounced alchemy and didn't marry mom because of making an oath to god! In fact mom joined you and became a nun!"

"THERES NO WAY THAT HAPPENS!", Ed shouted as he saw himself in black robes while waving his hand at the sky.

Edwin started laughing as he saw his father's reaction. "Haha! I'm kidding, kidding!"

Ed grumbled and lightly punched his son I'm the shoulder who still chuckled. The alchemist slowly smiled, Edwin still joked around and laughed despite his future. That was something to be glad off
1221111111111.title: A Father And Son

12211111111111.content:
Meanwhile, with Ling and Envy.

"I can't believe we're forced to work together!" Ling growled as he ran with Envy to escape the seemingly murderous mystery man.

"You're telling me!! I didn't sign up to cooperate with a HUMAN!" Envy complained.

"So I take it that guy isn't with the Homunculi?!" Ling asked.

Before Envy could respond, the mystery man suddenly appeared in front of them. Ling's eyes opened in horror, the mysterious sunglasses man...he had no presence!

"I can't sense...any form of chi from this guy." Ling said, stunned.

"Grrr....I don't care WHAT he is! You're gonna die!" Envy roared as he charged through the bloody sea at Frieden.

"Wait a minute-!" Ling ran after the angered Homunculus, wielding his scimitar.

Envy's arm transformed into a blade, the Homunculus' strike was easily avoided...and the blade was snapped off like a twig and promptly jabbed into Envy's eyesocket. "GAaaAGhh!"

Ling's blade was caught mid swing, Frieden's hand unscathed by touching the sharp blade.

"What the hell are you?!" Ling demanded as he jumped back. Smirking, Frieden held his palm out and green electricity shot towards Ling...zapping him and sending him flying back quite far.

Envy stood up, yanking the disintegrating 'arm blade' from his bloody socket which started to heal itself. "Hah! Didn't count on me being able to regenerate did you!?" Envy declared cockily.

"Actually...I already knew about that. I'm just having lots of fun maiming you." Frieden replied coolly.

"You damn bastard!!" Envy rushed Frieden, but the bio-android was ready..and snapped Envy's arm off...and smacking the angry fake human off in the direction Ling was sent sailing.

Meanwhile, Edwin and Edward weren't about to expect Ling and Envy to come falling from the sky!
12211111111111.title: A Prince & Homunculus vs. Perfect Being

122111111111111.content:
Edward an Edwin looked up at the loud noise and widen their eyes as the the Xingese prince and humoncili landed in the blood with a large splash.

The father and son quickly got up and Edwin knelt down to help Ling up. "Are you ok?!"

The Xing prince opened his eyes and groaned as he stood. He didn't answer the question as he simply said. "Be on your guard!"

The stone wall in front of them soon had a glowing circle carved out before it was blasted open. From the smoke emerged the tall figure of Frieden, he easily shattered a rock beneath his boot as he smirked at the other occupants in the humid subspace.

"My my you launch quite far, good thing I didn't break your pathetic bodies."

Edwin growled as he started charging at the future destroyer with a battle cry. Everyone looked at him with shock as Ed tried to grab onto him.

"Eddie!"

Frieden didn't move as the teen charged at him. Edwin rolled up his sleeve to reveal a large wristwatch, however rather then a clock it had a paper in it with a transmutation circle.

The circle glowed and as Edwin jumped, pulling his fist back the environment around him turn a shade of purple as everthing around him flowed. His fist connected with bio-mechanical being's face, right between his eyes.

As soon as the world return to normal, Edwin gasped as his arm was tightly gripped and he was held in the air. Frieden's shares soon broke and feel to reveal his dark eyes. The mechanical man smirked at the teen.

"Why look at that, the little pest broke my favorite sunglasses.", the power house didn't even flinch before with a simple swing Edwin was sent flying a wooden structure with a yell.

Ed widened his eyes in horror as he saw his son being manhandled. "Eddie!....you basterd!", The alchemist narrowed his eyes at his opponent.

"Edward be careful, I don't know what he is but he's not even fighting seriously!", Ling shouted as he tightly gripped his sword.

"Human or not I want to make this freak to bleed!", Envy growled morphing his arm into another blade.

Frieden simply chuckled and he formed a ball of sparkling green energy in his hands. "Such sour words from a disgusting creature."

The orb fired at Envy, though the humoncili managed to dodge. Getting thrown down as the explosion obliterated the pillars behind them.

"I must say your lack of empathy for life draws ties with the humoncili.", Ling said getting Ed to look at him a look of shock. Was he trying to angry this ruthless being?!

Frieden's eyes glowed red as he growled. "Do NOT compare me to those sniveling creatures! I am above them, above YOU, all of you are just a stain to erase from this world!"

The ruthless destroyer held his hand to the sky as he started forming a large yellow orb. Frieden looked up as he laughed.

"The future wasn't enough! In order to achieve a peaceful and beautiful world I must eradicate live sooner, before the hairless monkeys taint it!"

Ling looked to Ed and Envy before nodding his head towards Edwin. They seem to pick up as they started sprinting away from Frieden. Ed quickly picked up his barley consious son and threw him over his shoulder before running as fast as he could.

Frieden stopped his monologue as he saw the flashing outlines of where the three used to be. The mechanical man growled before smirking.

"Fine then little sheep, run away from the slaughter. It'll only make it more fun when your erased."

With a yell, Frieden brought the large energy orb, and a large wave of energy began exploding from the area to be seen miles away.

The fleeing humans and Humoncili heard the explosion and looked back to see the approaching wall of green. Ed widened his eyes before seeing a large stone wall.

"Over there!", the Alchemist ran behind the wall with the two following.

Ed held on tightly to Edwin as the ground shook and the Ray's of green light shot past the stone wall. Thankfully it was sturdy enough to shield them.

But still, Frieden was out there and it was going to take the four of them to have any chance of stopping him.
122111111111111.title: The Future Destroyer

1221111111111111.content:
As they all huddled behind the wall, they heard Frieden's voice take on a different and less hostile tone as he peeked around the corner at them and said: "Okay, time out."

"AAAAHH!" They all screamed, causing the android to cover his ears...just so Ed could transmute some of the blood into a fist and collide it with Frieden...who seemed un-phased as it crumbled.

"Now that was just rude." The android deadpanned.

"Wait...your eyes look different." Edwin said suspiciously.

"They do?" Ling asked as they all noticed Frieden's eyes were a happy blue rather than dark or red.

"Yeah..that's what they looked like before he went crazy....back when he was friendly." Edwin whispered to them.

"Heeey! What are we whispering about?" Frieden asked in an equally quiet voice as he was in on the huddle now.

"Gagh!" Ed and Ling cried out, scrambling back.

"What the hell is going on?!" Envy demanded of everyone present.

"How do we know this isn't some weird trick?" Ling asked the other two, excluding Envy once more..who was getting more annoyed.

"We never figured out what exactly made him go crazy...it just happened so fast. Maybe...maybe something in him went haywire and what he's like right now is his original personality come back to surface." Edwin suggested.

"Isn't there a way we can make him stay like this?" Ed murmured.

"The technology to examine him properly doesn't exist in this time." Edwin sighed.

Edward suddenly felt a tug on his ponytail, "Dingdong!" The android chirped. "I have two questions! One...." Frieden pointed to Envy, "Who's that palm tree?"

"And two...what are these symbols over here?" Frieden innocently dragged Ed by his ponytail over to the other side of the wall...that resembled parts of the mural that Ed saw in Xerxes.
1221111111111111.title: Conversing with the Enemy

12211111111111111.content:
Ed was grumbling as he was pulled by his hair and about to blow up at the bio human before he became focused on the mural. If this hell was what he thought it was then the humoncili must have been to Xerxes. Before he could think further, Frieden hummed as also observe the old mural.

"Grh, stop that!", Ed yelled as he jumped back and rubbed the back of his head from the feeling of strain.

"Oh sorry about that, my creator often played with his hair so I picked that up.", Frieden smiled and closed his eyes.

Ed was still feeling uneasy around the bio human, he had displayed great power and no doubt had the reputation Edwin talked about. Before the alchemist could question Frieden, the bio human held up and caught the large arm blade as Envy attempted to stab him

Frieden opened his eyes and childishly frowned. "Hey don't surprise me like that Mr. Palm Tree!"

Envy bared his teeth at the unintentional insult. "ERRH SHUP UP YOU FREAK!"

Edwin hummed as he walked over and picked up one of the fake human's wisps of hair. "You know it does look like a palm tree!"

The humoncili growled as he snapped his head to the young Elric, getting him to hold up his hands and quickly back away.

Envy yelped in confusion as he was soon held up by his hair. Frieden curiously looked him over like a child to a toy. "Wow I've never seen a creature like you! Creator has only ever shown me humans and and animals, put to change your body like this!"

The humoncili thrashed around as he was held, shouting obscenities at the cheery bio mechanical being.

The three humans watched with puzzlement and slight amusement at the show. Ling placed a finger on his chin.

"While he has no chi, I can see the complete lack of malicious energy."

Edwin nodded his head and concentrated on the change in the menace's behavior. "Maybe....when he attacked earlier he accidentally restored the Law program."

The alchemist and prince looked to the young boy in confusion. "The Law...Program?"

Edwin hummed and had a thoughtful face. "When Frieden was near completion, the military created the Three Laws of Robotics. It was a set of standards for any future creations to follow. A robot may not injure a human being or, through inaction, allow a human being to come to harm. A robot must obey orders given it by human beings except where such orders would conflict with the First Law. A robot must protect its own existence as long as such protection does not conflict with the First or Second Law."

Edward was fully entranced and beaming as his son told him all the information. He imagined what scientific development would come from these guidelines!

Ling sweatdropped as he gaped at the long explanation of the unfamiliar concepts.

"The Law Program was installed into Frieden's mainframe so that he would always stick to the rules.", Edwin frowned as he saw a flash of the red eyes. "But when undergoing maintenance a virus infected his body and his mainframe grew corrupt. So much that he could bypass the program's function, though he couldn't remove it himself as it would damage his body.

The three humans looked back to Envy finally tearing himself from Frieden, losing his arm as it was torn separating. The bio human only looked in amazement as the humoncili regenerated and looked at him with body murder.
12211111111111111.title: The Good Side

151.content:
Pick a slot and write out your OC

And remember.....GO PLUS ULTRA!
151.title: My Hero Academia

1511.content:
Adrien Bakugou

Age: 15

Height: 5'4

Looks: Pale skin with black hair and bright blue eyes. Usually wears baggy clothes and hoodies.

Bio: Adrien is a Moldovan boy adopted into the Bakugou family when he was three. Although it took time to settle in, Adrien grew close to his new family. His brother Katsuki shows his soft side when with him, though he can be violent if someone else comes into a five foot radius of Adrien.

Personality: Adrien is very much a introvert. He socializes well with his family and few friends, but dreads the idea of meeting new people. He'd rather spend his days inside, listening to techno music and euro techno beats. Adrien tries to be pleasant when he's forced to interact with a stranger.

Quirk: Molecular Speed, allows Adrien to slow down molecules to where someone or something moves in slow motion as well as speed them up to where they will combust.

- Drawbacks: If he doesn't concentrate, Adrien may accidently do the opposite effect of his quirk. He also tires himself out from using it too much.

Trivia
- Adrien is bilingual, able to speak both Japanese and Romanian. When distressed he will unconsciously began to speak in the other language.

Now, where does the story begin?
1511.title: Adrien Bakugou

15111.content:
"Oi Izuku!"

Five year old Izuku Midoriya turned at the sound of his friend's voice. Sure enough, his friend Katsuki Bakugou came trodding over. However, he was pulling along another boy.

The child contrasted Katsuki in almost every sense. Not only was his hair dark and eyes blue, but his presence was that of someone shy. He had on a navy hoodie and attempted to hide in it as they approached.

"Hey Kacchan!", Izuku smiled before bringing his attention to the other boy. "Who's this?"

The dark haired boy hid behind Katsuki as attention was put on him. The ash blond looked behind him with a "huh" before frowning and pulling the newcomer out.

"This is Adrien! He's my new brother.", Katsuki said with a grin.

Izuky awed at the news. His mother had said that Kacchan was going to be a brother. He was confused though, shouldn't he be a baby.

Putting those thoughts aside, Izuku smiled and held his hand out. "Hi I'm Midorya Izuku, I hope we can be friends!"

Adrien looked at the hand as his fingers fiddled with the hem of his hoodie. Izuku could hear strange words being mumbled out of the boy's mouth. Finally, he placed his pale hand onto Izuku's and lightly squeezed it.

"It...ice..to..et..you", the boy said quietly as he shook Izuku's hand.

Despite the awkwardness, Izuku remained upbeat. "Nice to meet you too En-Kun!"

"Hey En show him your quirk.", Katsuki said using the boy's new nickname.

The boy nodded before looking around the park. Spotting a lone ball on the ground, Adrien grabbed it before turning towards the other children. Taking a breath, Adrien tossed the ball as high as he could.

The boy then brought his hands up in a flaring motion. The meaning of the movement showed when the ball began to fall slower. It's as if someone turned the speed down on it, causing the ball to take fifteen whole seconds to pass Izuku's head and land on the ground.

"Ah wow that's so cool!", Izuku beamed at Adrien. The shy boy smiled slightly all while Katsuki grinned proudly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Is was great meeting you!", Izuku yelled as he said goodbye and waved at the retreating figures.

Adrien played with the sleeves of his hoodie. A smile graced his face.

"Hey Suki?"

"Huh yeah?", Katsuki said turning towards his new brother.

"......I like it here."

Katsuki grinned and patted Adrien's back as they made thier way home.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Where were they now?
15111.title: Childhood Days

choices: They went to the U.A dorms
1512.content:
In the sky approaching the land of the rising sun known as Japan, was a airplane carrying an assortment of people coming to the Asian country for a variety of reasons. One young boy was coming for a life changing experience in a opportunity of a lifetime.

Aleksandr Braginsky was sitting at the window of his row in the airplane. In his hands was a open pamphlet with a famous school of Japan, but more on that in a minute.

Coming straight from his homeland he was dressed in a long brown coat with a red scarf, underneath he wore a white button up shirt and brown trousers with his brown boots reaching his knees. His elbow length blond-white hair was tied in a low braid and his fringe fell to the left side of his face.

The boy's grey eyes sparkled in awe as he looked at the plamflet of the Japanese hero school U.A high. He couldn't believe he was leaving his snowy home and going to make friends in a new country.

The giddy mode was interrupted as a man next to him was shuffling around. In his movement the man's elbow ended up colliding with Aleksandr's side making the boy grunt in surprise at the sudden contact. It wasn't the last as the middle age man continued making jabs at the Russian boy's side and it started to grow some annoyance.

"Um excuse me sir?", Aleksandr asked getting one of the man's eyes opened. "Could you please stop moving so much?"

The man tched. "Who the hell are you tell me what to do huh."

"Sir-"

"I don't need some damn foreigner brat being up tight just cause his daddy didn't get him first class seats!"

Aleksandr rather then get angry, smiled. A childish smile as he placed his hand on the man's shoulder. However, the confusion on the disruptive man's face turned to shock as he let out a yelp of pain, as the blonde boy gripped his shoulder tight enough that he swore his shoulder blade dislocated. The grip was like that of three grown men and pressed against bone.

An aura of tension was emitted from Aleksandr as a shadow fell over his eyes. A cold air filled the air like that of a freezing winter.

"I wanted to polity ask you to stop nudging me. Of course, you wouldn't be able to do it if you were missing an arm да~", the boy spoke in a sinister voice with a childish tint to it.

The man shook at the boy's terrifying aura before hastily nodding. The aura seem to disappear as it was replaced with a sunny smile and a happy Aleksandr.

"Ah thank you for understanding!"

Turning back to his pamphlet, the Russian teen continued reading like nothing happened. The man rubbed his sore shoulder and tried staying still and sleeping, but Aleksandr's dark smile and voice did their work in keeping him awake.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Aleksandr smiled in awe as he stepped off the plane. The sun hit him as he took in the new area of Musutafu from the airports viewing area. As he walked towards the lobby and grabbed his luggage, he scanned the entrance to look for who would be picking him up and taking his to U.A's dorms. Soon he saw a man with long shaggy black hair wearing black clothes and a long white scarf.

Aizawa Shouta looked at the teen approaching him, well looked up as the blond head went almost a foot taller then him. He reassembled the boy from his file and even had on a childish grin on his face.

Aleksandr Braginsky

Age:15

Homeland: Oymyakon ( Russia )

Quirk: Blizzard, has the ability to create powerful snowstorms. This quirk allows limited aerokinesis and cyrokinesis with the wind and snow generated.

"Privet, are you my new teacher?", Aleksandr asked excitedly looking down at the underground hero.

"Yes my name is Aizawa, I'll be your teacher throughout this exchange program-"

Aizawa was cut off as Aleksandr grabbed his hands and began to throw them up and down in a handshake of sorts.

"Ah it's so nice to meet you! My name is Aleksandr Braginsky and thank you for letting me into your class!", the blonde boy was like a giant child meeting Ded Moroz.

"Uh yeah...anyway look I'll bring you back to the dorms. Tommarow you start classes and I don't want you holding back anything you hear?", Aizawa sternly asked after managing to get his hands out of Aleksandr's strong grip.

Aleksandr nodded and followed his teacher outside of the airport and into the city of Musutafu.

Next....
1512.title: Aleksandr The Exchange Student

choices: Timeskip to First Day in Class!
15121.content:
Aizawa took Aleksandr into a cab and after a short trip, which had the Russian boy globbed to the window staring starry eyed at the city, they arrived at Heights Alliance dorms.

"You'll be staying here with the rest of Class 1-A, the main school building will have classes throughout the week. Here is your schedule." Aizawa handed the exchange student a slip of paper with the schedule as well as directions to homeroom.

"Thank you so much!" Aleksandr chirped before marching right into the dormitory. Inside were Denki Kaminari, Mina Ashido, Minoru Mineta and Hanta Sero.

They were all discussing about the 'exchange student'. "I can't wait to see the hot Russian babe...they're always so seductive..." Mineta drooled.

"How are you so sure it's a girl?" Sero asked curiously.

"DON'T SPOIL MY FANTASY!" Mineta yelled.

"Who's that?" Ashido asked as she pointed at the as of yet unknown exchange student.

"I bet it's our sweet Russian bombshell!" Kaminari turned at the same time as Mineta.

And both were heartbroken as their hopes of a sexy buxom Russian girl were dashed.

"Privet! I'm here to enroll in the Hero Course! I'm your new classmate, Aleksandr Braginsky!" Aleksandr Braginsky greeted those present.
15121.title: Heights Alliance

151211.content:
Aleksandr leaned back and forth on his toes and heels in excitement. Right now, he stood in front of the door to 1-A and smiled as he heard Aizawa talking. The teen was at first concerned since his height often played an issue in buildings, such as all the marks he got on his head from hitting doorways. But luckily the door was tall for an assortment of different students.

Inside, Aizawa was giving the brief on Aleksandr. "As you know we're receiving a tranfer student today. I trust you'll all get along with him."

A certain electric and grape boi internally cried as they remembered thier shattered fantasy. Mina and Sero smiled as they remembered the Russian boy, he was eager to get to know them but had to get everything in his room set up so there was no time to talk.

Aizawa turned towards the door. "Alright come in."

Everyone watched as the tall student walked in, wearing the uniform with an addition of a long red scarf. At first glance he'd be mistaken for a adult with his height, but his childish face gave away his youth. The boy lifted his hand and smiled.

"Добрый вечер, I am the exchange student Aleksandr Braginsky. I hope we can be friends!"

A chorus of "nice to meet you!" rang out before Aizawa hushed them and pointed to where Aleksandr would sit. The back row of seats had been spaced out to make room for a extra empty seat placed next to a boy with split red and white hair. The Russian boy thanked the teacher before humming and strolling back to the designated seat, and sat down while wearing a happy face.

"Ok, today we're gonna be-"? Aizawa had begun to speak when the door to his class suddenly slammed open to reveal his colleague Present Mic.

"Yo Eraser, theres an issue and I need some help!", the hero with gravity-defying hair asked worried.

The scruffy hero groaned before turning to his class. "Talk amongst yourselfs, and don't destroy the classroom while I'm gone.", with that class 1-A's teacher exited the room.

Everyone began chatting and looked over to Aleksandr unpacking his back. The blond boy saw a shadow on his desk and looking up he saw a boy with blue hair and glasses.

"Greetings, my name is Iida Tenya and I am the class rep.", Iida gave a fast bow before holding out his hand. "I would like to welcome you to-"

Aleksandr suddenly bolted up and grabbed Iida's hand with both of his and began to wildly shake it like he'd done with Aizawa. Iida yelped as his body was thrusted and the Russian boy smile.

"Privet, it is nice to meet you! Will you be friends with me?", Aleksandr stopped shaking Iida's hand and allowed the boy to readjust his glasses before clearing his throat.

"U-uh well...of course." , as soon as the class rep said that Aleksandr ran around his desk and embraced Iida while humming. Iida slightly blushed as the taller student hugged him.

After pulling away, Aleksandr smiled down at Iida. "Thank you very much."

Iida nodded and smiled. "Of course, now I should introduce you to everyone."

Aleksandr hummed as he nodded and followed Iida over to two other students. A freckled boy with curly green hair and a brunette girl with a bright round face. The two looked over and smiled as they saw Iida with the new student.

"Midoriya and Uraraka I would like you to meet Braginsky Aleksandr.", Iida said gesturing towards the blond boy.

Uraraka smiled as she bowed. "It's nice to meet you Braginsky-san, my name is Uraraka Ochacko!", she then looked towards the freckled boy. "This is Midoriya Izuku."

Izuku nervously looked up as the Russian boy suddenly walked up to him. Aleksandr put a shadow over the boy who began mumbling as the boy reached out and....


Started rubbing his head.

Aleksandr closed his eyes and hummed. "Your very adorable Midoriya да~"

Izuku became flustered and started waving his hands. "Uh umm thank you! T-that's very kind of you!"

Aleksandr tilted his head and smiled. "So, will you two be my friends?"

Izuku blinked at the question before growing a smile. "Y-yes of course Braginsky-san!"

Uraraka brightly smiled. "We be very glad to be friends with you!"

The two were cut off guard and became flustered as Aleksandr pulled them both into a big hug and giggled.

"Большое спасибо!"

What was next?
151211.title: Aleksandr's First Day

1512112.content:
Aleksandr was introduced to everyone else of Class 1-A, at least those who he hadn't met earlier..including the two boys who were lamenting the fact that he wasn't some Russian babe.

Soon the Russian transfer student had met everyone except a certain grumpy looking blonde: Bakugo. As Aleksandr approached the explosive-quirk wielder he got a glare from the boy as Katsuki snapped: "I ain't interested!! If you're here to be all buddy-buddy with everyone you're here for the wrong reason!!"

Aleksandr stunned everyone by not only not flinching at Bakugo's anger, but giving off an intimidating aura of his own.

"Be careful who you yell at...Мудак." Aleksandr said with a smile..yet the aura he was giving off was anything but cheerful.

"What'd you just call me!?!" Bakugo yelled as he jumped out of his seat.

"I believe in your language it's pronounced shithead." Aleksandr chirped.

"WHY YOU-!!!" Bakugo yelled as he was now being held back by Kirishima.

"W-wow...I've never seen anyone stand up to Bakugo like that before..." Denki whispered.

"Y-yeah...come on Kacchan...give him a break?" Izuku said nervously.

Aizawa slid open the class door forcefully and yelled: "Alright that's enough! Bakugo and Aleksandr get back in your seats!"

Eraser's eyes glowed red as his hair seemed to levitate upward.

"Yes sir!" The class said as everyone returned to their seats.

What happens now..?
1512112.title: Rivalry Established

15121121.content:
With everyone seated, Aizawa deactivated his quirk and walked to the front of class. "Now, today we will be exercising your quirks. We'll spent some time seeing where your results stand now. After that, you all will do a quick sparing match. Now get changed and meet me outside."

Aleksandr hummed as he thought of using his quirk. How was he gonna use it, in fact how was he going to measure it? The Russian boy was giddy as he followed the boys to the locker rooms. Opening his locker, Aleksandr smiled as he saw his gym uniform ready to be worn, he began to strip off the top of his clothes.

Kirishima seeing Aleksandr grinned as he made his way over. "Hey Braginsky-kun!"

The tall boy hummed as he turned to the spiky red head. Kirishima's eyes widened as he saw the bulky muscles of the Russian boy. "Woah, you have such manly muscles dude!"

Aleksandr giggled and scratched his cheek. "Oh Спасибо! There aren't many people from my village, so me and my brothers often did a lot of heavy lifting!"

Kirishima had tears in his eyes as he clenched a fist. "I never knew the new student would be such a man!"

Aleksandr closed his eyes and giggled. "Kirishima was it, thank you for approaching me. If you wish, you can call me Aleksandr."

The red haired boy gave a sharp grin and nodded. "Of course, can't wait to see your quirk in action!", Kirishima made his way out of the locker room, leaving Aleksandr to happily change.

Soon the students of 1-A made their way out to the training field to meet Aizawa. Aleksandr stood next to Iida enjoying the comfortable gym uniform. A obstacle course was laid out with walls and combat robots currently not moving.

"Now then to start off you'll be making your way through this course and attempt to finish as soon as possible. Starting off are a group of five Midoriya, Ojiro, Sato, Yaoyorozu, and Braginsky."

The first five lined up at the start, Aleksander smiled as he patted Izuku's head getting a flush in return. Aizawa gave one of his grins as he started a counted.

"Remember go all out!"

"3, 2, 1!"

The five students sprinted from the starting line, Aleksandr's eyes became sharp as he put his energy into his legs. The first obstacle was a large metal wall going up 15 feet, Izuku powered up a portion of One For All into his legs and hopped to the top. Izuku yelped as a thump shook the metal and looking down he saw Aleksandr climbing the wall by sinking his fingers into the metal and crunching it. Izuku blinked shock and gasped as the Russian boy threw himself onto the ground with a thoom. The blond boy grinned as he got up, before Izuku continued as everyone eventually made it over.

Two battle drones stood and activated as Aleksandr approached. He looked in awe at the robot's before the familiar dark aura surrounded him and he smiled.

"I must pass so......отдых"

A cloudy substance surrounded Aleksandr's hand as he threw it forward. A strong wind blasted the drones back a few feet as ice started to form around their joints and soon immobilized them. Throwing his hand forward in a fist, Aleksandr hummed as he punched and shattered the head of the drone.

A green blur passed him and Aleksandr saw Izuku pass him. He looked surprised before smiling.

"Ah Midoriya is very determined, he reminds me of Lukyan."

Eventually the end was reached and Aleksandr came in second. After receiving the results he walked with Izuku and ruffled his hair from above.

"You ver very impressive Midoriya.", Aleksandr beamed to Izuku sheepishly smiling and flushing.

"A-ah thank you were really cool too Bra...breg... ", Izuku panicked as had trouble saying the Russian name. He knew a good amount of English but the slavic language was completely different!

Aleksandr looked confused at the short boy's mumbling before catching on to the issue. Giggling and crouching down, Aleksandr warmly smiled.

"If your having trouble with my name you can call me Sasha."

Izuku looked up in awe at the offer. "Sasha?"

Aleksandr ruffled the green hair again as a sunny aura surrounded him. "It is a nickname my family and friends use. I believe your worthy in using it little боб!"

Izuku blushed, but smiled as he nodded. "Well thank you then...Sasha!"
15121121.title: A Quirk Testing Activity

155.content: Here's some more Anime shows to pick from.
155.title: More

15531.content:
"Agent 84, your target lies at the Heaven's Arena. He is a competitor there. He is called Genko, our client wants him dead due to a vendetta. It stems from when the client's daughter was brutalized and murdered by Genko. He should be arriving around the same time you are." The voice on the other end of the earpiece buried within the young man's ear proclaimed.

The young man was of a strong build, his eyes were green yet seemed to hold a sort of coldness...as if the boy was detached from everything and everyone. His hair was that of a crew cut, he wore a black suit and blue tie over a white shirt.

Most peculiar was the apparent tattoo on the back of his head: A bar code as one would see on a product sold in a store.

However, to shield his identity...84 kept a gauze bandage taped to the back of his head.

As the blimp approached his destination, 84 took note of the familiar sight of the Heaven's Arena. "Doesn't seem to have changed..." He commented. The young man appeared to be in his early 20's..but he was experienced beyond his years in many things.

"According to our intel, Genko intends on becoming a floor master...you will ensure that does not happen. Our client wants it to look like an accident, but at the same time Genko is to be shown a picture of the client's daughter before you kill him."

As the briefing message ended, 84 heard the arguing of two young 12 year olds in the seats behind him. Turning to look their way, he saw....
15531.title: Hunter x Hunter: Agent 84

choices: Wait a little longer before you attack."
155311.content:
84 turned his head enough that he could glance at the boys behind him unnoticed. One had spiky greenish hair and the other had white hair that brought up one memory in particular.

The name Zoldyck was given to him in his years of training. He was told the family's reputation was true and to approach any members with caution. The boy may be young but the blood of a assassin runs through him just like 84's. It was strange though, the Zoldyck boy was teasingly talking to what he guessed was his friend.

"Gon I'm just saying think of all the sweets we could buy.", Killua playfully shrugged.

Gon held up his fists at his friend's words. "But...that's so much money Killua and to spend it all on that!"

The white haired haired boy chuckled at Gon's outburst. "I'm ready to see what cake I can get."

"Killua-!"

"If your going to act like toddlers then I suggest you not get off this blimp."

The two boys stopped their bickering as they heard the deep voice cut through the air like a knife. Looking forward, they saw a young man in front of them taller and gazing at them with serious voidful green eyes. Besides his serious face a notable sight was the large bandage on the back of his head. Gon looked in confusion at the mysterious suited male while Killua narrowed his eyes at being called a toddler.

"What's that supposed to-"

Killua was cut off as the blimp arrived and it was time to depart. The man stood up and made to leave but turned back to look at the two twelve year olds.

"The Heaven's arena will have the some of the most intense fighting you will ever encounter. If you still insist on getting off here then I suggest you take this seriously or you'll end with more then just no sweets."

Killua felt his teeth clench as the man talked down to them as if they were babies. They passed the hunter exam for crying out loud! The man departed before he could say anything and Gon watched the man leave with a confused expression.

84 sighed as he appeared the tower that stretched into the sky. The thought of the two boys entered his mind, looking back at his past taught him many things. One of them being that when everything seems easy something horrible can happen real quick.

Among the crowd entering the tower, one caught 84's eyes. A 6'1 man with a slightly muscular build, he had a shaven head and strange tattoo on his cheek. Taking a quick look at a small photo in his sleeve, agent 84 saw this his target in question Genko.

"I've arrived at the tower, and I've spotted the target.", 84 secretly spoke into his ear piece.

"Good, now agent 84.....
155311.title: A Hitman And Hunters

choices: Continue I (Stick with Killua and Gon)
Continue II (With 84 as he tails his target)
1553111.content:
Picking up the black suitcase which held his rifle and trademark dual pistols, 84 began to stealthily follow Genko. "HEY!" Or at least...he tried. Glancing behind him, he saw the Zoldyck boy and his friend, standing behind him and glaring daggers at his back.

Killua was the one who had shouted, he wasn't about to let this weirdo get away with talking down to him and Gon like that!

"For your information we've been here before. We made it all the way up to the 200s! So you should be more considerate and not underestimate people! Cause we might end up fighting against each other...I'd hate to embarrass you." Killua cockily snarked.

84 turned back to Killua and Gon and smiled confidently, the first sign of emotion he'd shown the entire trip. "I look forward to facing a Zoldyck."

Gon and Killua's eyes widened and Killua was immediately on guard. "Who are you...? How do you know-"

They saw the man place a finger to his ear and concentrate, "Agent...he's on the move." 84 heard in his ear.

"We'll talk later, until then..." 84 turned back around and waved them goodbye.

"Wait! Who are you? We don't even know who you are but you know who Killua is!" Gon protested.

"Relax, kid. You're in no danger from me, I wouldn't dream of pissing off the Zoldyck family. Besides, getting involved in the business of another bunch of assassins is bad for business." 84 called over his shoulder at them as he disappeared into the crowd.

Gon frowned and turned back to Killua, "What was that guy's deal?"

Killua had a feeling he knew who this guy was...
1553111.title: Tailing the Target...Or so He Thought

15531111.content:
"I don't know...there's just something bugging me about him.", Killua said as he started at the crowd as If hoping he'd spot the suited man.

"He seemed really fishy like when he touched his ear and had that bandage on the back of his head.", Gon sighed as he crossed his arms and scrunched his face in thought.

Remembering the gauze on the back of the man's head, Killua suddenly widened his eyes as he recalled a moment before he ran away from home. He heard his father being irritated about another new assassin, one that seem to be garnering favor for his skill. One thing he recalled in particular is when he was to be on guard if he ever encounter the man with a barcode and to look at the back of a stranger's head before engaging them.

"The back of the head...", Killua thought recalling the man's appearance.

Looking back at his friend, Killua looked surprised before chuckling. Gon still had his face scrunch and it was turning red from how hard he was thinking. Reaching over, the Zoldyck flicked Gon's forehead and laughed as the boy yelped and nearly tripped.

"Be awake Gon I think I got an idea of who this guy is.", Killua explained, his tone getting serious as he put a hand on his hip.

Gon blinked confused before turning back towards the familiar tower. "Really?"

The Zoldyck child nodded. "Yeah and I think we better do some investigating."

What happens next?
15531111.title: The Back Of The Head

choices: Killua and Gon Make Themselves Known
155311112.content:
84 tailed Genko into the arena's check-in lobby....or at least that's where he thought he was following him to. It turned out Genko was going to visit a local bar...perhaps to get his courage up to attempt the Arena.

Agent 84 spotted one of the bartenders having a smoke in the alley, 84 approached the man alone from behind and got him in a chokehold, dragging him behind a dumpster as the man fell unconscious.

As Killua and Gon peered around the corner they saw 84 emerge wearing the bartender's clothes. "Whoa..he's good." Gon commented as 84 went inside and took the role of the bartender.

Killua's keen eyes would see 84 slip rat poison into Genko's drink. "Weird...that dosage wouldn't kill him it'd just..make him have to vomit." Killua said thoughtfully as they peeked through the window.

Moments later Genko stood up from his barstool clutching his stomach. "UUgh...oh god...I gotta go to the bathroom." He rushed off towards the men's room.

Killua and Gon observed and followed 84 to the back of the building, sneaking inside the establishment was no big deal..they were hunters after all.

The hallway around the restroom was deserted as everyone was up front at the bar area. The door was cracked and they heard 84's voice speaking to Genko. "You should've known you wouldn't get away with it forever..not my problem you were wanting to enter the Arena." 84's voice said.

"Y-You're gonna just kill me when I'm telling you I can pay you TRIPLE what that old geezer is?!" Genko cried out, his voice sounding hysterical. As Killua peered through the door he saw 84 holding a picture of a young girl in Genko's face.

"Whatever future you envisioned for yourself you threw away when you brutalized a young woman and slit her throat that night. Consider this karma if you like...either way I'm getting paid." Gripping the back of Genko's head, 84 plunged the murderer's head down into the toilet water filled with his own puke.

Gon and Killua heard Genko's gurgles and saw him flailing madly to escape...but with one final spasm...he went still and the bubbles stopped.
155311112.title: Switch back to 84

choices: 84 begins to ascend the arena's floors
The boys catch up to talk
1553111121.content:
84 did a quick pulse check to make sure Genko was ultimately dead. After the confirmation, the hitman positioned the bald man's hands to the side of the toilet. To those who came across this unsavory sight they would assume the man had got gotten drunk and drowned himself while vomiting.

84 cleaned the back of the deadman's head to ensure any possible fingerprints were erased. His 'borrowed' uniform had some staining, maybe he should clean it?

The creaking of the bathroom door made 84 quickly stand and reach for a knife he'd concealed. The hitman grunted as at the entrance stood the Zoldyck child and his friend. The white haired boy peaked at the dead Genko before looking back at the man.

"So I was right, you are the guy with the bar on his head."

84 unconsciously touch the guaze on his head before letting out a dry chuckle. "I shouldn't be surprised, of course a Zoldyck would have heard of me."

Gon kept his eyes off Genko, crinkling his nose at the smell and looking at 84 with confusion. "So...why did you kill him?"

84 relaxed slightly, still keeping his guard up. "This man decided to take the life of my clinet's daughter. While the reasons are unknown I can say he didn't give her mercy, and so I didn't to him."

The hitman slowly walked up and looked down at the boys. His serious green eyes shined though the shadow covering his face.

"Now I have to ask this, what will you two do? As someone who's killed others to another killer, you know what it's like don't you Zoldyck boy?"

Killua kept a straight face as he nodded. "Yeah don't worry we're not gonna go snitching or anything."

84 closed his eyes and nodded. However, the hitman suddenly began reaching his right hand towards Killua. He and Gon got on the offensive as the tension and the air thickened. It ended however when...

The hitman placed his hand on Killua's head and ruffled his hair. The two hunters stared in surprise and a light blush formed on Killua's face. As 84 exited the room he called back.

"I'll see you both in the arena and you better not hold back."

Once they were alone, Gon chuckled at his friend's face. Killua shook his head and growled before leaving the bathroom followed by his spiky friend.

Next...
1553111121.title: Killua and Gon Make Themselves Known

15533.content: Here are some more choices~
15533.title: More

155331.content:
Takes place around episode 10 where Yukine is working at Daikoku's food stand to pay off the money.

Yukine poured some of the miyabi soup and took a taste. "Mm..." It was good, not a bad job if he said so himself! Daikoku was out and had left the youth in charge of the food stand. Yukine had been working to pay off the money he stole for the past week after his ablution.

"Carefuuul! Might have to charge you for that!" Kofuku singsonged at Yukine. "N-no way! You can't charge me! I'm working here!" The blond youth cried out.

Yato was lazing at one of the tables and had a strangely serious look on his face. "What's wrong Yatty?" Kofuku asked as she glomped the youthful god.

"I just am sensing something odd...." Yato informed them. Yukine raised an eyebrow, "Like a phantom or another god?"

"No...it's something else but not entirely unlike either of those. It's certainly not a native inhabitant of Japan...it feels foreign...wild." Yato said.

As if on cue a young ginger haired boy with fox ears and a fox tail sprouting from a convenient hole in the back of his pants popped around the corner.

Yato and Yukine stared with wide eyes...however Kofuku had a different reaction:

"AWWWW HE'S SO FLUFFYYYY!" Kofuku glomped the strange boy and tackled him to the street. "Ooof! Heey!" Renard cried out.

"Wait...you can see the ears and tail?" Ren asked curiously and seemingly surprised.

"Were we not supposed to?" Yato asked casually.

"Well regular humans can't see them...so I'm assuming you three are...less than ordinary...no offense." Renard answered.

"I am the great war god Yato!" Yato exclaimed with flair, "And this is my regalia: Yukine!!"

"I can introduce myself!" Yukine snapped. "I'm Kofuku! I'm the god of poverty!" Kofuku's bubbly nature seemed to be the exact opposite of something so negative.

"Uhhh....hi. I'm Renard...I'm the fox totem." Renard finally pushed Kofuku off of him.

"Totem?" Yukine asked curiously.

"Native American spirit animal." Renard said as he got up and dusted himself off. "Wait...so what are you doing in Japan?" Yato asked, intrigued...he never really affiliated with the gods from overseas.

"Exploring....wanted a change of scenery." Renard shrugged and casually folded his arms behind his head. "Also, I'm looking for someone...my roommate."

"Is he fluffy like youuu?" Kofuku squealed.

"Not really, to put it plainly he's a vampire." Ren answered. Yukine paled, "W-what?! Vampires are a real thing?"

"Don't look so freaked out, a lot of what you hear or see in movies is BS. Though to be fair he IS the reincarnation of Vlad Dracula....the OG vampire." Ren said as if it was an entirely normal thing to say.

"There's vampires now?!" Hiyori shrieked from behind Renard, not noticing she'd left her body behind...again.
155331.title: Noragami

choices: They offer to help find Xavier
1553311.content:
"You don't have to worry, my roommate can be a pal once you get to know him~", Ren said as his ears twitched and he hummed.

Kofuku internally squealed as the temptation to feel those soft ears went from 100 to 1000. The pink haired got quickly grasped the ears and began rubbing them while cooking at thier soft texture. Renard jumped in surprise.

"H-hey wait aaaaaaah~"

Ren's surprised face changed to the of a dopey face as a sparkling aura surrounded him and he mewd~

It was a amusing sight but Hiyori couldn't enjoy it for long as the previous conversation still lingered. The young hanyou rushed over to face Ren still in his blissful state.

"You said that vampires existed, is it really true?"

Ren knocked out of his state at the question and nodded. "Yep vampires are real along with many other things."

Before she could continue, Yato spoke to Hiyori. "Hiyori you dropped your body again."

The Iki girl gasped as she saw her dark pink tail was out, before hurrying back to her body.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ren had his arms over his shoulder as he held onto his lazy face. "His name is Xavier, like I said reincarnation of Vlad yadda yadda yadda and I've lost him."

Yukine looked curiously at the spirit animal. "You said he wasn't like the vampires from T.V?"

Renard playfully smirked. "The dude's not hunched like Nosferatu or sparkly like some teen romance mombo jumbo."

The foxboy seemingly disappeared before appearing behind Yato and made the god jump as he laid two fingers on his neck.

"You should see him in action, his method of feeding is weird...but cool!

Yato childishly groaned as he rubbed his neck. "Well I'm not eager to find out how he does it!"

What was next?
1553311.title: The Fox Totem

15533111.content:
A stranger approached the food stand, Yukine rushed over to the counter since this was a customer and he had been left in charge after all! However, when they got a look at the young man it was clear something was...off. He wore an enormous sun-hat, reflective sunglasses, a scarf and coat and jeans. On his feet were a pair of sneakers that were blood red.

Renard looked up, noodles hanging from his mouth from the soup bowl he was eating from. "Ah! Xavier!" Renard put down his meal and rushed over to the heavily bundled up and pale looking boy.

"Yeah, you got any donburi?" Xavier asked Yukine casually.

"How do you know all this Japan stuff?!" Renard demanded loudly of Xavier.

"Because unlike YOU I did research." Xavier scoffed as Yukine prepared Xavier's order. Upon seeing Xavier pulling out his wallet and producing a yen note to hand over to Yukine, Renard flew into even more of a fury.

"How do you have the proper currency!?!"

"Someone has to handle the finances...we can't get very far with U.S. dollars here, fluffy." Xavier said coolly.

"They remind me of Yato and Yukine...." Hiyori thought.

"So uh...are you really a vampire?" Yukine asked nervously as he cooked the meal.

"Yeah, it's not like you hear I promise..I don't go around biting into people's necks and killing them and all that." Xavier sat down inside and took off his floppy sun hat.

"So uh...what IS true about vampires? And what's a myth?" Hiyori asked cautiously.

"Well...like I said the feeding part...mostly we just knock our prey out with our breath or hypnotise them with our eyes. Then we make an incision with one of our claws." Xavier held up his hands and they noted that his fingernails was slightly pointed.

"Usually somewhere where a small scrape won't be noticed. Then we drink enough to fill ourselves, seal up the wound with our spit and go on our way." Xavier explained.

"That sounds a lot less horrific than what I'd expect." Yato commented.

"Garlic doesn't hurt us, crosses don't work unless they're properly blessed and stuff, same with holy water. Sunlight depends on how long we're out in direct sunlight...but we're not getting turned to dust the moment we step outside." Xavier went on.

"What about the fangs?" Kofuku asked and made a cute 'rawr' face.

"Retractable, and only stupid amateurs go out biting people...that's a good way to get yourself caught." Xavier hooked his finger around the inside of his cheek and pulled it back a bit.

Yukine, Hiyori and Yato looked as Xavier's canines morphed into a pair of pointy fangs and then back again.
15533111.title: A Strangely Dressed Stranger

155331111.content:
Yukine rubbed his chin as he gave Xavier his donburi and received the yen.

"So....your the reincarnation of Dracula?", the Shinki asked with curiosity in his eyes.

Xavier smiled as took in the delicious smell of the rice bowl while absentmindedly answering. "Hmm oh yeah it's kinda a thing that happened."

Kofuku hummed. "Then does that mean you were born in Transylvania."

Xavier gulped down the large mouthful of rice. "I mean I was born there but as of recently I've been living in america-"

"With yours truly~", Ren said sliding into frame before sliding back out.

"Right...anyways yeah so my ancestor was big and bad, and may be know for impaling his enemies. But i inherited his strength and power so i got skill at my disposal."

"So how did you two meet?", Hiyori asked curiosity.

Ren grinned as he placed his elbow on Xavier's head. "Well he just gotten to America when some evil spirits started stirring up trouble. So I being a spirit animal, hopped in and saved him!"

Xavier threw off the foxboy's arm and put him in a headlock. "You goof, I had everything taken care of intill you came over and disrupted everything!", the vampire gritted his teeth

Ren suddenly flashed a blast of blue fire in Xavier's face. The vampire grunted before flipping the Totem to the ground and pinned him.

Kofuku pouted. "Hey no fighting! If there's any damage you'll be paying."
